I watch everyone around me find the love of their lives. I see people being chosen, being obsessed over, being picked again and again even after they've hurt someone, even after they've caused trauma. Meanwhile, I'm here. The one who stays. The one who puts in effort. The one who consoles, who supports, who shows up. And I'm never the one being chosen.

I'm so tired of hearing it: "You'll find someone soon. You're still young. You'll find a better girl who's going to be obsessed with you." I don't want to hear it anymore. Those words have lost all meaning. They feel like empty promises people say to make me feel better, not because they're true.

I used to believe in keeping your heart open even after getting hurt. I genuinely thought that if you stayed open amd kind, the right people would find you. That they'd see your heart and choose to enter it. But now, I don't think the right people even exist. I've lost hope of meeting someone like-minded, someone who's like a carbon copy of me, my female version, someone who just gets it.

And the cruelest part The people who don't even care about finding love, they find it so effortlessly. They stumble into it without even trying. Meanwhile, I'm the one who craves it, who wants it, who needs it, and I get nothing. I hate this stupid craving. I hate this constant wanting. It feels like punishment.

Is something wrong with me Is there something wrong with how I operate, how I love, how I show up for people Why does trying so hard seem to guarantee nothing

I hate this. I'm tired. And I've lost all hope.

On Time and My Weird Relationship With It

I keep feeling like I never have enough time, like the hours in a day are never enough. Which is ridiculous when I think about it, because its not like Im working or following some rigid structure. If anything, I technically have all the time in the worldat least if I live one day at a time. In the grand scheme of things Shit, I dont know. Maybe I am already too late for everything.

I know I should be doing something productivelooking for a job, learning new skills, fixing my finances, trying not to be a bitch or a spoiled brat about it. Whatever. The usual lectures I give myself. But I also feel like I never really let myself rest. Rest in a way that actually touches the parts of me that feel soul-tired. Rest in a way that gives relief, not guilt.

Whenever I try to rest, I somehow end up feeling like theres still not enough time. Which is insane because I have so much fucking time. Im gaming, watching Stranger Things and other shows, trying out shows Luisito suggested, answering messages from friends, writing journals, playing with creative writingnone of these exist inside a structured schedule. I dont even have a routine. I have absolute freedom. And yet I feel like Im constantly running out of hours. How the hell is that even possible

Im not working. Im not waking up early for shifts. Im not balancing anything heavy. So why do I move like someone being chased by a clock And can you imagine how chaotic itll be once I am working again With work-schedule exhaustion on top of everything else, how would I even fit gaming, shows, writing, and the rest of the things that make me feel alive

Maybe thats the point. Maybe this exhaustion Im dragging around is exactly what makes me feel like time slips too fast. Because when your soul is tired, even rest feels like a chore, and even joy feels like something you have to schedule.

So yeah. How the fuck do you heal a soul-tired How do you rest something that doesnt feel like it gets rest from sleep, fun, or distraction

I dont know. But Im sitting with the question.



 Jenny, and Indebtedness

Jenny messaged me today. For the past few days shed been texting me about the BLACKPINK concerthow happy she was, how she danced to every song, how she felt carefree for the first time in a while. And I was genuinely happy for her. She went alone, but she enjoyed herself. Just that alone is already a win for her.

Tonight, though, she shifted back to venting about her girl problems. She brought up her situation with Cath again. And my god younger people can be so exhausting.

Jenny clings to Cath the same way she used to cling to me.

Obsessively.

Intensely.

Blindly loyal.

And that same intensity is why shes drowning in mixed signals right now.

I get it. As a recovering people-pleaser, Ive been there. Ive clung to someone just because they threw me crumbs of affection. Ive confused attention with connection. But with what little energy I have left these days That is absolutely not for me anymore. Its still a work in progress, but I actually understand my worth now. And if someone gives me mixed signals or doesnt match my effortwhether platonic or romanticIm letting them go at a drop of a hat.

Jennys at that age where everything is loud, everything feels black-and-white, and every emotion feels like a moral battle. Shes in that era where If I did something nice, I deserve reciprocity feels like law. Maybe Im not explaining this perfectly, but the whole thing just tires me. I no longer have the patience for situationships, emotional confusion, or wasted time. If someone doesnt meet me where I am, I simply move on. Maybe thats why I have fewer friends now. Honestly Probably. And Im okay with that.

But heres the part I didnt want to admit:

Theres still this thin thread of indebtedness I feel toward her. Not because she deserves it, and not because I owe her anything. Its more like she was there during the most messed-up, unraveling part of my life. When I disappeared, she fought for me harder than I fought for myself. She didnt give up on me when I had already given up on everything.

How do you erase that

You dont.

But you also dont let it dictate your boundaries.

And thats the tension I keep sitting with.

Watching her obsess over Cath irritates me because it reminds me of who I used to bethe girl who tolerated emotional ambiguity, who overthought every message, who accepted crumbs, who mistook chaos for connection.

Im not that girl anymore. Or at least, I try to not to be.

And I will never be her again.

If anything, now, when I dont like someones energy, I leave. Still not the best habitI know I need to improve communicationbut its still progress. At least I no longer let people consume me.

But seeing Jenny stuck in the same loop makes me want to shake her and makes me step back. I know that cycle. I survived that cycle. Im not going back there.

Maybe thats why her situation stingsits not projection, its pattern recognition. Its watching someone drown in a cycle I fought like hell to escape.

The truth is, I appreciate Jenny. I always have. I appreciate the timing, the weird intensity, the iMessage novella era, her devotion, her chaos, all of it. But appreciation isnt obligation. And kindness doesnt mean I have to carry her emotional baggage for her.

And maybe Ive validated her feelings too much, to the point where she expects that comfort from me automatically. Which is sweet but also draining. And maybe I need to have that uncomfortable conversation and set a real boundary.

I just dont feel like having that awkward talk right now. Shes stubborn. Im stubborn. We still argue sometimes, and that youthful need-to-win energy is just too much for me these days.

Ill deal with her tomorrow.

I thought we were falling in love. The way he touched me, the way he spoke to me. Taking me to meet his family. Begging to watch my dog for me. The way he praised my touch and my kiss. The way he wanted to defend me from my ex. The way he cared for me. All felt real. All felt like love. 

Now, I wonder, not exactly, if he was pretending, but if he just didn't know what he was doing. If he didn't know what signals he was sending off. Because he sometimes doesn't. For example, when he took me to meet his family at his nephew's birthday party, he didn't understand that that would seem like a big deal to anybody else. You brought a girl you've been seeing for four months, and everybody in your family knows you've been spending almost every weekend at each other's houses, to a family birthday party. And you didn't think that that was serious You thought that was the same thing as bringing one of your school friends over You tell the girl you're fucking that you love her every time before you hang up the phone and you don't think she's going to think you mean romantic love 

That math is not mathing, and I'm angry again. And then I miss him, and I'm sad again. And I feel fooled. But I don't really think I did anything foolish. 

Anyway I was falling in love. I don't know what he was doing. I like to think he didn't know either. But now I have to question: can an otherwise smart man really be that obtuse

One of your parents was born in the countryside. As a kid, up until the middle of primary school, that parent would be comfortable roaming around barefoot, including outdoors.

You have chosen to live a life with no peace. You choose to go into the world as someone ready to fight. However, you are still in tune with your emotional side. This means that you are not a robot, or a hardened soldier. You have just chosen to be comfortable with being taken as such.

Right now, you are in a transitional phase of your life. One where you still havent reached a clear decision. You need to find your own path, one you choose as an autonomous individual, rather than one skewed by your lineage.

Dear diary, 

the time is nigh and 24 hours have almost come to pass. I have to get this out now, before I forget. 

Last night, in the witching hour I had a vision. I found myself wandering through a dense forest, with no compass or map and only the North Star to guide me. If it werent for the Moons glow, illuminating my path, I would not have been able to see. I continued to wander curiously, and eventually found myself standing in a clearing. I took in my surroundings - the lush greenery, tall evergreen trees. Flowers respirating, awaiting another day and still vibrant all the same. Even in the heart of night, and I

Suddenly, out of nowhere a mirror appeared before me and beckoned me to it. Without question, I complied. It asked me to look into it. Without question, I complied. It asked me, What do you see 

Oh, when I looked into the mirror it was me whod Id seen. But not me, the other me. I asked the mirror, What does this mean

The present moment: Direction  
My rough draft, its exactly that. There is no need to deconstruct or destroy it - refinement and revisions can be made as the story continues to unfold. There is no right or wrong way to approach this. I am the author, after all. It does not have to be perfect, it just has to beme. That being said, I am committed to my story beginning and ending, with happiness. Rather than trying to start over from the very beginning, Ill pick the story up where it left off:

line break Chapter 33: The Homecoming

There she was, perched in her corner of the cafe like a modern-day sphinx with a cappuccino. Her world was a book, and whatever was on the page was making her laugh in these short, tiny burstsa sound that made her scrunch her nose in a way that seemed to delight even her.

But the main event wasn't the coffee or the comedy. It was the Bag.

A deep, cavernous tote sat beside her. Earlier, Id been treated to a preview of its contents: a lip balm, a rattle of mints, a folded umbrella, and a tiny wallet had all made brief, dramatic appearances. It was a magic rugsack, and each time she plunged a hand in, I held my breath wondering what shed pull from its dimensional depths. How much did that thing weigh What sacred algorithm decided what made the cut each morning A pack of gum, but not a hairbrush An umbrella, but apparently, a deep sense of existential uncertainty

The moment of truth arrived. A purposeful dig. Aha Her phone. Mission accomplished.

Or so I thought.

Suddenly, the entire ecosystem of the table was in flux. It was time to go. Out came another, smaller bag a pouch A bag for the bag The plot thickens. The pen was evicted from the tabletop, the lip balm returned to the mothership, the hilarious book sealed shut. It was a tactical packing operation, each item slotted into a specific, unknowable quadrant.

Finally, she stood, hoisting the bag and wielding her umbrella not like a simple rain-guard, but like a warrior hefting a shield. She was armed for the battlefield of the outside world. She turned, ran a mental checklist, and her eyes widened. A final, decisive toss of the mint box into the abyss.

But wait.

A thought struck her. A terrible, forgotten thought. The pre-departure calm shattered. More digging. Furious digging. The book came back out. The pouch. A sanitizer bottle. I could see the panic setting in, a quiet storm on her face. Pockets were patted. No luck. A frantic glance under the table, then back to the bag, her arm submerged to the elbow. This was a full-blown archaeological crisis.

Then, a look of pure, unadulterated relief. From the depths, she produced her keys. The car keys. The holy grail.

With a sigh that I felt from across the room, everything was unceremoniously shoved back in. The ecosystem was restored, however chaotically.

I shook my head in sheer disbelief as she marched for the door, a warrior who had, against all odds, found her sword just in time for battle.

Please dont be bitter.

basically saying:

Hey
you did all these things to me,
my feelings are shattered on the floor,
but Im going to confront you very gently,
so please dont get mad at me
for the things you did.
I still want you to love me through the mess you created.

OMG.

from the same person who caused the damage.

I cried for things I didnt even do,
things I wasnt responsible for,
things he did.

Imagine being the victim
and apologizing to the criminal
for making him uncomfortable.

Yeah.
That was me.

I dont know exactly how should I talk about this or with whom, and its been on my mind from the last few days so Ill just write the whole story here hoping I could get some answers. I feel like I have been unknowingly harassing someone and now Im constantly guilty and ashamed because of it.

Context: I go to a bank almost everyday as I have to make deposits for the company where I work and also I have my own business account with them so now almost all the staff knows me quite well. To an extent where theyd do my stuff without requiring id if they needed to. Theres one CSR who joined there only like a few months back so she would always be working at the front counters and thus Id see her 3-4 times each week. Conversations started from Hi, how are you and slowly we started talking about almost everything going on in our lives. Our likes, dislikes, hobbies and everything else. At first I thought this is only because its her job to communicate with the customers and maybe thats all shes doing but when we started having longer conversations I was like maybe I should ask her if shes okay being friends outside as well as I really loved her vibe. So I asked this thing to her and I was like only if you feel comfortable to which is said ya its totally fine and she gave me her personal phn number so I texted her later that day but we couldnt chat much because of our opposing schedules. But wed talk more and more whenever I used to visit the bank like even if some other person is helping me with the deposits she would still come and talk to me. So one day I texted her just a random hi but she didnt reply and i asked her the next day she said that she talked about this to one of her coworkers and they said maybe its not a good idea being too close with a client as banks often discourage this. After that I texted her okay maybe I understand what you are saying but can we meet for a coffee after work and she didnt respond to that text either. A couple days later, when I went to the bank, one of the other employees came up to me and asked that he wanted to talk to me about something this guy knew me more than all others at the bank as he handles my personal investments and all as well and we have been friends for more than a year now Even before who said anything, I could already sense this but he said that he wanted to talk about that whole situation as she said she doesnt want to get involved in this matter and at one point wanted to escalate this to the manager too. He told me that he understands maybe my intentions werent wrong and this whole situation became a bit exaggerated but its best if we put this to rest right here. I just replied yes okay and came back to work. Since then, I have been thinking about this and now I feel maybe I misunderstood the cues and she was actually trying to give me signals that I should stop but it was ignorant of me. So after this whole situation I tried to avoid going to the bank as much as I could and didnt see her for like 2 weeks and I have stopped talking to anyone at the bank now because I am too ashamed to kinda look in their eyes. Today I had to go make the deposits again and it was only her working at the front so she said hi and when I got to the counter she did ask how are you hows everything to which I just nodded and asked back then I started using my phone to avoid the conversation and to avoid even looking at her because I didnt want her to think if Im staring at her or anything. I dont know if I could have avoided this whole situation or maybe I just dont know

Its called Because She Can So She Will and gives you insights on different parts of your life and then asks questions that make you reflect and enhance your self awareness. It also allowed me to dig deeper within my self and understand the cause of things Ive been missing for a while. Theres all sorts, its like my personal diary plus a perfect gift. Its changed my mindset for the better I love that it allows self growth and it doesnt name make you feel bad for doing it at your own pace

Head space is the everything and in it you will find what you are looking for even if it is not what you want.
Be careful the things you see. spend to much time and you will learn to be as vile as those you hate. You may not be what you eat, but you will become what you fear if you do not spend your time learning to be anything else.

Idk if it's because I am so used to compartmentalizing negative feelings, I guess what I am saying is that I acknowledged the shittyness of it but never really let it come thru more than that. I seem to continue to dwindle into such loneliness. It is positive that I have made some good friends in recovery but even that for some reason seems to fade back into a lonely place. It's just hard to write because I know I can end this uncomfortable situation really quick, but I will have to go back to continuing to write my story doing things that are either one not good for my long-term health or two risky to my freedomliberty. You only get one shot at your story, and I don't want mine to end broken sad old man or worse no longer allowed to write my story, So it's just pressure.

In the very beginning, when the COVID gates came crashing down, an associate of mine created an answer.  I can no longer honestly call him a friend, so associate it is.

We ran events that kept the music flowing and expanded friendships around the world.  It grew to a point we had performers from Japan and Singapore.  From every continent except Antarctica.

This past week, technicians who were brought in behind my back delivered a deficient product, and I commented on their failure based on my 40 yrs of IT.  
As expected, one of the technicians blasted me back without a clue as to my credentials

What was not expected was that my "partner", whom I had supported for half a decade, running 6 events a year for two years and 4 events a year for the remaining years

Who asked me to stand as a buffer against political issues at industry gatherings....

That "partner" refused to stand up and support those statements of mine he had earlier agreed with.  100

In my time in both military and industry, I always stood by those who I worked with and they always stood with me...

until now.  
So, I have let him and his invention go, to deal with the world without my support

Now, I get to sit and cry for a bit.  
It will be a sad Thanksgiving.

Trust is a fragile thing. Its not something you can demand, no matter how sincere you are. I want him to see that I am not here to break him. I want him to know that distance doesnt scare me, that I am willing to take the leap and start a life with him - not because I need saving, not because Im lost, but because thats where my heart feels drawn.

But this morning Im sitting here with the ache of knowing that loving someone doesnt automatically earn you a place in their certainty. Im learning that sometimes the hardest part isnt loving someone - its waiting for them to trust you with their heart.

I still believe in us. I believe in the life we could build. But I cant force trust to grow. All I can do is keep loving honestly, keep showing up, and hope that one day he looks at me and sees that I wasnt just a feeling - I was home.

Until then, I breathe, I hope, and I hold on.

D x

I remember the first time I thought "what did I do to deserve you". I asked myself so many times when thinking of him, especially in the beginning. He was everything. I kept thinking, this is it. This is how you are supposed to be treated when you're in love, this must be the universes gift for the things I have been through. Playfulness, sparks, feeling safe with being open and honest. Feeling loved.

Things happened, things changed. When they did I was assured many times it was not me, it was somebody getting in his head. I believed him.

After everything, I continued to be open and honest. I was a little gaurded because of the hurt he caused me and the hurt I caused myself with my own actions. He promised from the beginning my vulnerability was safe with him. It wasn't. He already shattered me to pieces once, I should have known better. He used the open wound I was still recovering from to degrade me, in more ways than one. An argument we had, he viciously told me what he thought of me. I told him I craved the feeling of love I knew or thought he had for me, I was refused that love, that softness. 

The last time we were intimate. I remember it so vividly. I wonder if he does, if it is something he thinks of with remorse or with pride. I thought I knew him, I don't think I ever really did now. The way it started with soft kisses, pulling me in close, the way he kissed my neck and would inhale and that low sexy growl. Getting started, what is usually foreplay "If you keep doing that I'm going to cum. I know you want to get fucked, don't you". No, I didn't want fucked. I wanted him to make love to me, to finish the way he started. After he said that, I remembered the words he said a few weeks piror. He knew what I wanted, what I needed. I left the choice to him to stop me, he didn't. When he finished, we curled up cuddled on the couch. I cried, silently. Not making a sound as I did, something I learned to do from previous failed relationships. I felt used, I was used, I was just flesh like so many others. Now the words that keep replaying in my head "I would never fuck a prostitute like that". Still even though time has passed, those words lingered. Bringing more tears to fall.

Now I sit here asking myself the same question with a completely different mindset. Knowing the answer will never come because you are either embarrassed by causing me this pain or what I believe on some sick level you're proud. The question still remains

What did I do to deserve you

Somewhere out there, we are both staring at the moon. I know you're going to come into my life soon. I'm so thankful for you, and know that you are preparing room in your heart and your home for me. I've been wondering what you look like, and what sort of adventures that we will share together. Sometimes I see you in my dreams, whispering gentle words of comfort and love to me. Until we meet. I'll keep the lights on for you.

Dear diary, 

last night Id come to the conclusion that I may have to set it all on fire, to begin again. To rework the rough draft. Time has proven again that things require refinement, a revision of sorts. That is atleast whats in the realm of control within my, realm What would be the purpose for history repeating itself, otherwise

not hastily, my impulsivity requires me to sit with a thought for at least 24 hours before executing action. A refinement Ive adopted to benefit, me. 

Ive still yet to reread the passage. Lets start there, at the very beginning.

Once upon a time

All these emotions from this year were tipped over the edge by pretty much being told that nobody is willing to help my family out with my dads dementia. Now I have a potentially broken hand I feel sick and just want to curl up in a ball and die. I'm just done with it all.

Its been four years since my breakup in November 2021. I was devastated then, but Ive worked hard on myself since and made real progress in my life.

Now Im ready to date again, but it feels like the window has already closed.

 The Pressure from All Sides

My parents keep asking if Ive found someone, but I havent met any real prospects. Between my heavy workload and mounting responsibilities, Ive lost the patience and energy to go on dates.

Everyone wants to lecture me about what I should domy parents, my managers, everyone. It feels like I only exist to serve other peoples expectations.

 No Space to Be Myself

I posted some Instagram stories recently hanging out with friends, having drinks and smoking. Even my friends told me I shouldnt post things like that. I cant even express myself freely anymore.

My parents tell me to focus on the right things, yet in the same breath they compare my salary to their friends sons and say mine is too low. They lecture me about losing weight and taking care of my well-being.

 Being Used and Exploited

After work, Im lonely. My manager seems aware of this and uses it to pile more work on me.

Everyone around me is trying to lecture me or exploit me for what they want or what they think is right. Its frustrating.

 The Dating Landscape Is a Mess

The women Ive met so far havent been right either. One wanted me to move to a different city with her permanently. Another was addicted to weed and sugar, and already looked older than me. One got drunk and told me shed slept with 41 people, then wanted me to marry her.

Even my married friends are now getting divorced. Its all confusing.

At the office, a junior colleague hit on me once, but shes not my type. And a senior woman got attached to me without me even trying.

 Where Do I Go from Here

Everything feels like too much right now.

Today, my humans moved me off the couch and stole the ONLY good spot in the sun  Are You Kidding me  How do they expect me to be all warm and comfy without sun  Do your human servants treat you with this disregard  
  
When they moved to the room where they have food, I followed in hoped they would give me something that was - at least - new.  But I just had the same old stuff in my bowl.  To make matters worse, they brought in a giant dead flying thing and left it on the table with barriers so I couldn't get to it

So, first, it is dead  I can't play with it.  WHAT THE FUR

And they put the body on display to taunt me

What's next  
They're plotting something.  I can tell

2025 November 26: Dear Diary,

I must be honest, oh dear reader, I have recognized that a lot of my problems stem from an intense subconscious self-loathing. There is no real reason why I should hate myself, but this is what the problem seems to be. My best guess is that I do not live up to the standard I have set for myself. I do not feel that I am good enough at anything and I feel that people think the same about me.   
  
There is no evidence of this. All I do is imagine people betraying me and talking behind my back. No, there is no evidence of any of that, only paranoia. The paranoia only happens because of my self-loathing, which I have no need for. I must believe that I am worthy of love and respect and give it to myself. I must allow myself to just be in the moment.  
  
There are so many Torinicos I love and yet I feel as though I cannot connect with them. My subconscious mind will find any excuse to find evidence that people hate me while my conscious mind knows I am good enough. The only Torinico I do not like is the one that thinks they have to be perfect in order to fit in. All of the others are so loveable and it is not fair that they hate themself.  
  
I should focus on my creative work and less about fitting in. It really does not matter if people do not think I am good enough. They most likely do not believe that anyway. All I have to do is give myself the care I deserve and most of my problems will fade right there. Putting myself second only hurts myself and others, so it is something I should abandon.  
  
Sincerely,  
  
The Self Aware Torinico

B threw me off my game in the best of ways. He became my new routine in no time at all. The center of my weekend plans. The first and last voice I heard most days. Texting constantly. Checking in at lunch break. Calling him on my way home. It was such a contrast to the way my ex-husband had ignored my messages and curved my phone calls. B made me feel cared for and connected. Called me 5 times a day sometimes, like prayers, to hear my voice, to tell me something funny, to say he missed me. So the new silence these past two days is noticeable. 

I try not to replay memories. But certain things just keep floating to the surface in my mind. His big, dark, serious eyes when he told me on our third or fourth day, "We both know what this is, and where we're going." Laughing naked at stupid movies in bed and brushing oil into his hair. Him bringing me a glass of cold water and a multivitamin in the morning with a forehead kiss. Feeling more free and loved and myself than I ever remember. The way he slid into me in the dark like our bodies were formed to fit together. The voice in my heart that growled, "Mine" the last time he laid his his head on my chest and sighed into my skin. And how touching that feeling felt like a live wire; how fast I mentally backed away and told myself, NO. 

He has a favorite coffee cup in my cupboard, he called my bed "ours," and referred to his side. He has a toothbrush in my bathroom.

Yesterday I cleaned out my fridge like I do every week, and it happened to be time to throw out all the things we had bought last time he was here. Then the peach jalapeo jam from July and "Good Luck, Babe" on the Spotify stole my breath. I had to turn the music off and sit down while the spike of pain from my stomach up into my throat receded. I want to laugh at myself, but it still hurts too much. 

Room by room, I gathered up all the odds and ends he'd left scattered around my house over the past 5 months: a beard comb, a band t-shirt, some socks, a charcuterie platter. I kept the souvenir he brought me from the big concert he was so excited about. I made a mental note to ask him for my house key back. When I asked him when I could drop off his things, he ignored the question and instead sent  me a picture of the pie he baked for Thanksgiving. I like to think that means something. That it hurts him, too.

I hate the TikTok and Instagram algorithms. They always end up showing some effing annoying 'viral' videos that I hate and have put in settings to try and avoid but the still keep showing them.  If they show them I stop using either for a few days at least. One also has to not watch videos that you'd only watch every now and then or it'll show you endless amounts of them and they're annoying too.

I F21 am trying to fall asleep while listening to my boyfriend snore over the phone were long-distance and my mind wont stop replaying things. I have an upcoming flight in December, and Im already queasy about possibly seeing his sister. We dont have the friendliest relationship.

All I can think about is the time we all went to Top Golf as a family my boyfriend, me, his brother, sister, and dad. When the afternoon wrapped up, we wanted to take a family photo, and she had the nerve to say she wanted another picture but without me. Who even says that And me, being a shy people pleaser, just let it happen. Ive never felt so excluded. She barely acknowledged me, didnt say hello, and made almost no effort to talk to me.

Then another memory came up the very first time I met her. We stopped by her house for a quick introduction. I was dressed modestly: a black floral shirt, jeans, and high heels. I like wearing heels because Im only 4'11", and people often mistake me for being 1617. Heels make me feel feminine and more confident about my height. But a few minutes into meeting me, she pulled my boyfriend aside and whispered for him to be careful. Like what I had just met her, and she was already being bold and judgmental. If I ever acted that rude, my mom wouldve slapped me into the next millennium. I was raised to be polite, and it was literally just a quick hello there wasnt even enough time for me to accidentally offend her.

And then theres his mom, who once asked if we met on OnlyFans. Yes, my boyfriend was honest with me about his past porn addiction and how his parents found out about how much he spent on OnlyFans and Fansly but that is NOT a reason to assume Im one of those women.

Im just so frustrated with the way his family treats me. I vented my frustration about his sister to bf and he said he was sorry he didn't argue or fight me it felt really genuine

Im still madly in love with you, though it's been a while. I still think about you every day. Still write songs and poems about you. Still wanna tell you about my days and hear of yours. My heart aches every time you cross my mind. They say time heals all wounds. I think they lied.

Im 45 M yes Im old. Anyway I woke up today with a pretty bad headache. I figured I just didnt get enough sleep so I slept another hour. When I woke up I saw sweating a bit and my headache was still there and pounding. Also the slight smell of sweat made me nauseous so I took a shower which was difficult but was quick to kill the smell. 

Getting ready to leave the washroom I realized the nausea getting worse. So I leaned over the toilet and puked. Then slept a few more hours. 

I woke up again in pain and called into work to say I wasnt coming in the pain was to intense. Almost as soon as I did everything needed I grabbed an ibuprofen and gravol. I was about to take them but felt the nausea increase and puked again. Then I took the pills.  Then slept again for 4 or 5 hours. I slept most of the rest of the day and night waking here and there. Ive been awake now for about an hour and a half and the headache is still there but has subsided a lot.

I realize Id rather have a cold or flu compared to a migraine. Sure I feel bad but with a migraine I just want to die to end the pain. 

Anyway Im going to try some food now and stay awake a few hours.

Ive come to conclusion that it may just be limerence. That its actually not love I feel for you even though I think it could be. We wont ever get together, Im not even your type of woman. Ive idealised you and everything surrounding you. I crave you, I yearn and long for you. But still, you dont see me the way I see you. And it breaks my a little, because I wish you would. I cant have you and I guess you wouldnt even want me. You are like a drug to me, I think about you all day, wondering if you miss me, wondering if you think about me too.

And I cant do this anymore. I break my own heart by waiting, by adoring you silently. Were just coworkers, just friends. I dont know what happened to me to feel this sort of strong emotions for you. Maybe its because you were there in the most soul crushing time of my life, maybe because you actually listened to me. Maybe because of the attention you gave me.

I have to let you go. I cant keep loving a ghost. And I wish I could tell you about it. I wish I could show you all the things i wanted us to be. Still want us to be. But these feelings arent mutual. I sit alone with them, quietly, hoping, almost begging you for your love.

Thats not how it works. Not how its supposed to be. I wouldnt even make you happy. And I want to see you shine, to see you happy. But I must accept that it wont be possible for me to be that person for you. Id probably break your heart like I break my own. I still fight my battles. I still am not okay emotionally. And even if we ever could get the chance to be something, I want it to be true, genuine and healthy. Thats not what I could offer you right now. You deserve someone who loves you loudly, not like me. Someone who will make you happy, and is not unhealthy obsessed over you like me.

Ive had to stop myself so many times to not text you in the middle of the night. To not tell you that I love you. To not tell you that I woke up crying because Ive dreamt about you and missed you after I woke up. And what would you even say if I told you all this

I was weak today.. I didnt mean to text you that much. Thats why I havent texted you yesterday too. Because I am scared. Im scared that its all not true, that Im alone with it, scared that its Limerence. When I told you I miss you, just know I meant it. I miss you all day. But I have to stop wasting my energy and time on something that isnt real.

I love you, Im sorry. -V

I love music, but music is my Time Machine to my past. While on my way to work today, I heard the song "Forever" by Papa Roach, and that's when the guilt and shame started. Now, nine hours later, I'm here to ask a rhetorical question : "Do I deserve this life I have now " I've done some terrible things in my life that I feel horrible about. I've paid my debt to society and have made everyone whole. I've even apologized multiple times over the years, and my apologies have been accepted. But, man, I still feel horrible. I've accomplished more in life these past thirteen years than I did in my previous forty-one years. I'm about to be fifty-four . So, while I'm sitting here taking my lunch break, I'm asking myself, why was I blessed with this life I now have

Living and breathing is back breaking work, if you want anything you have to work for it. Honestly I dont think life is worth it, the pleasures in the world dont matter if you have to work half a lifetime to get close to them, not to mention if you work there's no guarantees you'll get it. 

I dont think Living is worth all the work I have to do for it, if I have to spend like a third of my life just working to survive with small pleasures in between I dont see the point in living at all, some people say the work is what makes it worth it and I sorts get that even if I dont agree but you dont only work for the things you want, you have to work for EVERYTHING and it sucks.

There no decent way out of it either, I have racked my brain for ways out that aren't just dieing and there are none, zero, zilch. There are easier ways but they aren't guaranteed either. As many choices as I have on what to do with my life they all just boil down to the same thing, work.

So in conclusion, life is a scam, capitalism sucks mostly cuz it doesn't benefit me, im lazy, and i fully and wholeheartedly believe that everything should be handed to me on a silver platter.

Last time I posted my thoughts, I had a few people messaging me asking about my mental health due to a bad episode of HS if you know what it is, then you'll understand. And its not high school either. 

I'm still struggling with it but that particular episode is coming to an end. Days have become clearer, my brain isn't as foggy and I'm slowly crawling from this slump. Over the last couple of days, I've returned to playing GTA online and just taking some all important time out for my mental health.

Eating healthier food and drinking water has been helping too. The days will get easier, sure. But the mental struggle will take a long time to get over.

Thank you for reading.

Created a post offering to speak to people who had suffered trauma and were struggling with their thoughts and feelings as a result. 
I helped a lady understand and cope. It was a good day for us both.

TW: Approaching or pending death

I'm sorry. I'm sorry I screwed your life up on some things when I was younger. I'm sorry that I was too much of a selfish jerk to not take to heart the lessons you gave me. 

I'm sorry I'm sitting in the house, crying right now because I just got the news of your terminal diagnosis. 

I'm sorry I got the news and I'm crying. Death is where you go on. Where Christ and His angels hold you. 

I'm sorry I yelled at God. Asking how this could happen. I'm sorry I didn't stay your second to last hospitalization. I'm sorry that I didn't stay the last time I saw you awake. 

I should have. 

If it was malpractice I will take care of it. 

I just...I don't want you to die. 

I'm sorry.

Alot can happen in a year. This time last year I was with the person I saw forever with. 10 years together, the days flew by. We got sober together, had our child, worked, and became a family. Yet somewhere along the way life happened and we just started existing instead of really seeing each other. I wanted it to work, God knows I did. I begged, I cried, I lost all self respect. At some point I finally chose me...just barely, but it happened, and continues to happen each day. 

I left the house we shared, the car, most of mine and the kids belongings and I started over. I didn't know what it would look like, but I knew it wouldn't look like me sitting there, being content with him seeing a co worker. 
Leaving was and is one of the hardest decisions I ever made. I left my job and the only friends I had. I moved into my mom's, no car, new job, new school for the kids.. 2 kids, one adult and all of our stuff in one bedroom. But slowly I'm picking up the pieces. I got a car immediately, I had to get back and forth to work and our daughter to her apts. I made new friends at my new job people I can't replace, and i finally got approved for my place. 
The crazy thing is I kept going, even through the tears, oh my... the days were tough. I've cried to my therapist so much. I've sat in bed for hours after everyone is asleep, tears rolling down my face.  I was crying today and begged God for some relief on the way home from work and when I got home I got the call about my place

i feel like when i tell someone i am a nihilist it doesnt really register, especially where moral principles are concerned. morality is subjective. to me, its clear as day. there is no wrong or right. there is no truth, there is only you and what you make the truth. thats why nobody can agree on any ethical conundrum. sometimes i feel like people arent ready to have that conversation. sometimes i feel like people dont think for themselves. i dont REALLY think that. there is me and then there is everyone else, and they are all individuals just like i am. like i said, i dont believe in wrong or right. it just is what it is. but when they talk about stuff like its so simple, just, i dont know. just the way people talk about things. everything is way too complex for me to express through language. i feel like in many cases the more words i use the less the truth comes through. i dont really believe that either because to me there is no truth but i still manage to get all worked up over things ive said.  what if i talked alot less and i spoke in the vague and cryptic way that i see fit i already dont have any friends. the only people i really have conversations with are my mom, sister, social worker, and occasionally my dad i am a teenager. socializing is performing no matter what. to live is to perform, really. but should i say things that i think will keep the other person interested should i mirror their attitude and sense of humor if i deliberately avoid doing that arent i still making a conscious effort to appear a certain way there are too many variables. i hate words and sometimes i hate everything else that comes with living too. sometimes life just feels like a nonstop onslaught of excruciatingly uncomfortable sensory input. i have to believe that there is a place for me but the second i think about it everything just feels like sharp, painful noise. i want friends but that doesnt seem like a realistic goal at this point in my life. i go to an alternative school where theres very few kids in my class and befriending any of them is pretty much out. i dont think i could get on well with most of my peers. something about their views, the way they joke, the things they like to talk about, the things they like to do. i dont know. looks like ill have to be alone for a while, at least. a lot of times life feels bad. more than it feels good. i hate thinking about what ive gotta do to make it better. it just makes me feel like ive wasted all my time here doing everything the wrong way when in fact there is no wrong way. that doesnt mean that i shouldnt try and do things differently though. i dont know, im so difficult. i hate myself.

When I'm asked if I believe in magic,  my answer is that I absolutely do but 20 years ago outlook on it was quite different.

Today I sit with the anguish and an unsettling feeling when I think of the world and how many people are using the power of magic to hurt others.

I won't get into that but I'll just say, my intuition was screaming at me the  day I made the phone call not to make it but I just figured it was because of my previous criminal record and my problem with authority because of that.... I was very wrong.

Let's just say this small shithole of a town isn't ready for the inevitable...but it is inevitable and will happen eventually. There will be reckoning on the evil that has gotten away with the most disgusting things for way too long.

So I watched my daughter terrified of something...someone...multiple people on a daily basis before they tried to end my life and didn't succeed. They took her and the corruption took over.

This cult will be put to an end, I will make sure of it.

Then over a year later as I watched my fianc being affected by their work... See he got put in some kind of trance one evening amd wandered through the woods all night into the next day, after that he was never the same and was constantly insisting he needed to go into the woods, he was not the same person, his eyes would glaze over and it took me following him and basically forcing him not to go, I believe they were.doing divination on him. He didn't even know it and didn't remember alot of things when he was in that state of mind. I believe they sent him to put an end to me because I saw everything and their magic wouldn't work on me.

The night he committed suicide, I believe his mission was to put an end to my but somehow was able to break free of his hand and mutter the words "baby please stop, I love you" with the return answer being "don't call me baby" but then he suddenly got up pushed me into our daughters closet and told me not to come out, I think those words I was able to get out woke him out of his trance. As I opened the door, I saw him fumbling with what looked like something wrapped in a t-shirt ans then bang He was gone and they each snuck into my driveway with no hurry to their steps, the first officer acted like he had no idea he had shot himself,  the ambulance was third in showing up...the detective was last. He said he listened to my call and I repeatedly said he shot himself,  how do you not relay that to the emergency services, why was there no hurried intention, why no lights and sirens blaring. Why why why

I'll tell you why because they already had a plan or knew what was going on, this was our life non-stop for the last 2 years. I felt like I was some kind of actress on a twisted film with no script.

But you know what I hope every single person that had anything to do with any of it has underestimated as I assume they have....

This shall unfold quite wonderfully and every single individual will.be expose for the fucked up people they are and I will sit back and watch as each and every one of them tells on eachother.  Bahahahhahahah

2025 November 24: Dear Diary,

Ask and it will be given. I was manifesting that I would do better at my job and I have been. Living without fear was another manifestation and I am starting to improve in this. Working on my creations, reading, and overall just enjoying life were things I have wanted to manifest and they are coming.  
  
Manifesting can be made simple. Sometimes I lose faith and things get scary. It can feel foolish, but then I see the results and feel vindicated. I should never doubt because that gets me nothing. My life is my own alone and I should focus on doing what the Universe asks of me.  
  
Sincerely,  
  
Torinico

Im not anyones. Im spending this holiday week working my dead end job while the kids are with their dad on a fun trip with his family. I have no extended family close enough to be with. 
Every time I think someone is starting to want me, to love me, they end up pulling away once I get attached. I am not anyones. I am not what anyone wants. The people Im drawn to never want me for long. 
Im so tired of being alone. Im tired of living in survival mode. Im tired of being hopeful, of wanting a romance that no one else wants to have with me. 
Im tired of being reminded over and over how Im so deeply disliked by the person who used to love me, who I still have to interact with because of our children. Im tired of waiting for someone to want me. Im tired of people telling me that I should just find ways to like being alone. I do like it sometimes, but at the end of the day I crave having someone who wants to hear how Im doing. I crave someone who sees me and who likes what they see. I crave touch that doesnt feel transactional. Why does it feel like thats impossible for me Was my unhappy marriage really the best Ill ever have

Dear diary,

today, I awoke like any other day. Well, I was woken out of my sleep with a call, that familiar sensation of nausea washed over me. Something to do with Cortisol. I wanted to go back to sleep, but my room is too hot and the fan isnt doing any justice. Once I am awake I am awake. Since yesterday evening, Ive felt this strange sensation. Something that feels like an absence. There is a stillness, a quiet that I am not used to. I dont know any other way to explain it. No it is not necessarily a bad thing but different. Like the presence of something you can feel but cant quite see has taken pause. Id never thought I would find myself questioning where its gone. Or that Id attached myself to it in any way. But thats the thing about familiarity. You only truly notice, once its gone. Or maybe I could be wrong and its the opposite of what I think. I have been having very bizarre and vivid dreams as of late. I intend to start writing everything down to make sense of things. I dont know. Something is different, something is shifting. I wonder if anyone else feels the same.

What a weekend I spent this weekend doing a lot of things mainly thinking about life and things I need to change I've gotten back into yoga recently as I stopped because my husband thought it evil because that he was taught. However he hasn't been complaining watching me stretch and bend at all so I must not be that evil huh

My original plan was to wake up early Saturday and start faking however I slept in instead not complaining at all and I only got to make one batch of brownies and a batch of fudge still not complaining because I actually got to bake like I wanted to I also cleaned up the house and did laundry as usual.

The exciting thing was I had a good surprise. My husband went to go get dinner Saturday night and I thought I would take a shower before I got back before I jumped in the shower I realized I'd forgotten my phone charger and I was almost out of my audiobook and my phone is dying. So I walked into living room to get my phone I was naked and I saw someone looking in my window not purposely looking in my window but just like as if you're turning to leave the porch it was my neighbor. The neighbor that I accidentally  purposely flash that one time apparently he was knocking on the door and I didn't hear him I pretend I didn't see him on the porch and instead of running back into the bathroom I started walking around the living room offending to pick something up and adjusting things he had gone back to his car by this time but I can still see him or my eye from his car looking into my window.

Now Sunday was a great day of relaxing finished up some laundry picked another batch of brownies for my coworkers finished my audiobook and I'm halfway through another book. As I was in the bedroom stripping the sheets off the bed to change them I hear noises I walk into living room and hear people talking to porch. My husband had grown out to get some fresh air turns out the neighbor was out there talking with my husband I was very scared actually that maybe he was telling my husband that he saw me naked but from what I can hear they're just talking about cars. 

As evening wound down I made a delicious dinner and I planned out my week it's a short work week coming up and I've been trying so hard each evening to do stuff for myself I'm hoping now with the extra days off from work I'll be able to do more for myself even though I still need to clean up my office before I can do any of my crafts LOL.
Bed is the most comfortable place in the world. I could spend all day and all night in here. Worrying

I miss him. It makes it worse is that he is still my best friend but also not. So much more than. A friendship I have not been able to define. We share everything, every thought. Every happy moments,sad moments, hard truths. We bemoan our jobs,share good mornings and sleep well at night., Speak for hours even after he has taken his sleeping tablet and becomes groggy but refuses to hang up. He sends me pictures of his food or his beer. HIS CLIVIAS. But more than that, he brings so much sunshine in my life. His crazy stories and his constant teasing. The way I can always make him laugh,no matter how grim the situation. He cares so much,maybe too much. 
He has gone back to his ex,she still has a boyfriend. She needs him now, he says. The sex is so good But I dont see my bubbly, chatty buddy anymore.  Weekends and his birthday are now reserved for her. No more Saturday night cheesy movies or watching cricket or the Springboks kicking ass.
And now I dont see that happy side anymore. I only see the sad, serious part. I see someone who has to call his best friend when she is not around because she will get jealous and cut herself. He cant talk about me or go to the concert with me anymore. It upsets her. IS THIS what makes him happy 
I feel like I am having an affair with my best friend. I AM SO FUCKING SAD. 
I am conflicted and messed up. I want him to be happy but not at the risk of losing himself. I truly love this man. I love how he light up around me and how he brings out the softer side of me. I like the version of myself when I am with him. But I miss him. The crumbs coming my way arent enough. He says he misses me too. I wonder if he does.

There are nights

when the silence grows too loud,

when even breathing feels like breaking,

and I sit in the dark

with nothing but my shaking hands

and a chest full of storms

no one knows exist.

People say time heals,

but time only teaches you

how to bleed quietly

how to hide the tremble in your voice,

how to smile like youre not drowning.

Some of us dont run from loneliness

we live with it,

sleep beside it,

wake up to it

like an alarm we never set.

And all I ever wanted

was a pair of arms,

a gentle warm hug to fall apart inside,

to break without being seen as weak,

a voice asking, Are you okay

and meaning it.

But not everyone gets chosen.

Some hearts were built

to sit in the back row of their own lives,

clapping for others,

waiting for a name that is never called.

So here I am

hugging myself because no one else will,

learning how to survive

without hands to hold,

learning that sometimes

the loudest screams

are the ones no one hears.

And if Im being honest

Im tired.

Tired of pretending Im fine,

tired of being strong alone,

tired of hoping someone might see me

before I disappear into the quiet.

TW death a few years ago, I'd briefly interacted with this kid in my college. He was a lot junior and overall a kind hearted soul. We'd briefly make small talk, he'd always joke about something and I'd often appreciate how unproblematic and lighthearted his presence was. I found out that he passed away and although its been ages since I even thought of him, something about that is very unsettling. I don't even know him but I think about how kind souls often fade away sometimes. but their memory and the way they made people feel will always remain.

I just wanted to write about this because I'm up late stressing, so I might as well. 

I recently turned 18, and moved in with my best friend across the country. We were supposed to move to an apartment shared between us, but his mother insisted that we live at her place for a while. I have severe depression, and this house is beyond suffocating. She is somewhat evil in nature, and I think she genuinely might hate my guts now. 

Long story short, I decided I wanted to go home. I take a flight in the morning to leave and get out of here for good, hopefully never to return. I love my best friend, just not his mother. I wanted to stick it out, but it felt like my friend was also distancing himself from me and I was actively breaking our friendship by living together. 

My family is helping me move back, I barely scraped together enough to send some boxes home so I would have clothing to wear when I got there. And some small comforts to help moving back in be easier. 

So when I ran out of packing tape on a sunday when the store was closed and I truly didn't have the money to even buy a roll of tape, I felt a bit devastated. I walked to the store, praying that maybe my EBT card would work to withdraw cash. His mother berated me before I walked to the store, calling me stupid and all the other things shes been calling me. I was already pretty shakey, and I cry really easily. 

My card ended up not working. I had a few rolls and we tried to just see if it would work. When it declined, I just freaked out. I started crying, and I felt so stressed and freaked out on what to even do. But the person in line behind me paid for my packing tape. This naturally made me cry even harder, but I said thank you a lot through my tears.

I know I'll never be able to pay back that man, but I hope I can pay it forward one day when I'm no longer in this spot financially. Super nervous about my flight tomorrow, but I'm trying to keep in mind that there are kind people everywhere when you give them a chance. 

If you got here, thanks for reading. Kind of a tangent because I'm tired, and I doubt I'll get any sleep before I need to go to the airport. Its my first time flying, so I can only hope things go well.

I deleted my old account, drunk, and made a new one. Lost all my messages and friends conversations. I made a huge mistake

My husband recently passed away 102525. It has been so hard to deal with everything, and know it will get easier with time. These past couple of days have been the hardest. I'm just trying to keep my ahit together for our kids. He was only 38, and now I am a 36 year old widow. I can't help but be so mad at him for leaving me.

Putting this here and hoping I'll believe it.   
  
Him standing me up tonight says more about him than it does about me. He didn't do that because I'm not worthy of his time, he did it because he's too scared to move us forward OR let me go. If he can't make a decision, I need to. Because there might not be a timeline, but every time we get closer and then he pulls away, it hurts more. Every time I get over him and he comes back, it hurts more. I don't deserve to be hurt, or lied to, or misled. I deserve honesty and transparency. I need to draw limits with him and stop pretending this is going anywhere, or that we will ever be anything. Those fairytales might be comforting in the short term, but he keeps breaking my heart, and I keep picking it up and giving it back to him with both hands, and it has to stop. 

Update: After a long and painful conversation, we have officially decided not to move the relationship forward. He still wants to be friends and hang out when we both have time. But he's not ready for a commitment. He got out of a long and terrible relationship a little more than a year ago. I just got divorced about five months ago, just a few days before we met. So maybe I'm not either. We were both just looking for a hook up when we met. But I was willing to adjust to the fact that we found each other so fast.

Dearest Diary,

Today I awoke with a heavy heart. Agitated with the unknown of what is inside and a heart I must just hide.

I had a mix of dreams and a struggle to sleep.

It was both about a fear and a desire.

She overpowers any darkness that sits upon my mind, but yet a heavy heart is restless.

Her beauty but that and more then a queen. Her eyes worth more and better looking then any and all jewels upon this earth.

Her heart and emotions feel much the same as mine but beauty pours from her.

If I could only reach for her, I may destroy the world.

For if she says yes, it will break the town upart, but if she says no, it will do both to break the town apart and flood the world with tears of sorrow.  

So I awake with new thoughts upon my mind, to add to the extra billion shuffling around, the thoughts of you, the thoughts of me, the thoughts of her, and the thoughts of many.

Is it that the heart is just a little down;

Is it maybe just a lust, or is she everything I used to dream about and now I want her as my escape;

Maybe I want her as everything, because she is everything, and I can also help her. 
 
I really stuck guys, I want her so bad.

Sitting in darkness I constantly ponder my own definition of sanity.

I see the world and hear the screaming in my ear, but the bounce never follows the echo.

I know what has to be done, but my body trembles at that which signals bleeding in front of me to stop, to run, to escape, to yell, to do something Anything, but standing still in the motion of existing. 

I tell myself over and over with the imaginary dreaded pebbles dripping from my forhead, taunting me to breathe without collapse. 

Breathe Breathe Breathe

My feet move with brilliance just the same as my hands labor to continue a routine my mind refuted, but still movement continues without the plain of my own presence. Just movement, just existence. 

Here I am again. Here I am. 

Is this my fault...

Well of course it is.

At least some part.

I stayed. I choose. I remained hopeful as one would when loyalty is of fault not of complacentcy.

I didn't think. Did I

Was I afraid Frozen Voided of spirit

Who am I, who was I

Why did I let this happen...

I'm here now. 

Now.

Now. 

I want to believe that what I desire is possible. I want to believe that fortune is only due in patience. But without movement, with presence, is fortune truly recognized Is fortune achievable

I hold the cards to my life as he held his all this time.

Do I move on. Will I ever find what I am looking for just being in this position I am cemented in. Is it fair

I am human. They would be too. 

We have choices. Just don't fall in love. And if you do let me bare it with clarity in my palms. Let me hold this gently. Carry it like a child born from womb to light. Tender affection I will carry this, sentive to breath. Just please breathe with me the air it quantified. Hold it, don't be afraid, when, if it comes to life, our lips may tremble, but I promise you will no longer tremble without embrace. 

Let's only hold it even if a moment is all to be had. Even if it lives without sin. Leave its designed innocence to dissolve within the divinity of our creation. 

Two labored shaken pounding hearts. 

To simply feel the connection of cosmic energy, touching tips of its effortless beauty. 

Fortune born from my deepest feathered sheets, whisper's in the plain of Dreamland. 

Lost souls dancing tunes of a love storybook.

Sigh. 

Let it be true...

M18 I've had this feeling for quite some time now and it got stronger in the past few days. I think that people rarely want me the way I want them around me. I might seem not that interesting to them.irl and online I want to talk, but it's hard while being an introvert. I always wish that they start a conversation with me, because I made them interested in some way, my looks, my behavior, my interests, but no... I'm was always jealous of the friendship other people have together, they don't act like strangers together, they act like a family. 

Don't get me wrong, I reach out to them from time to time, but they don't really do it in return. Don't have time or forget about me... I don't want to be too pushy as I don't want to force them to meet up, it feels kinda wrong too. I have had good friendship in the past, but my friend just turned into a bad person for some reason and started to talk bad about me to other classmates. Now I only have a couple friends that I can show my true self with. It takes so much enegry to lead a conversation and I feel sad that I'm not that interesting to them.

This feeling gives me strenght if I think about it in the gym. I feel more motivated to look better, more apealing. But at the same time I feel hollow inside, I don't understand what I do wrong or how to change that. I only feel like myself amongst strangers if I'm in good mood and had enough sleep, as I have the energy to engage with more people. Ususally I'm quiet, and I hate it. If someone puts 60 into the conversation or the conversation is interesting, I can show my true self too. 

Maybe I'm bad in conversations, maybe I don't put in the work, maybe I'm not good enough for them. I'm just tired always being the first one to reach out all the time. I finally want to meet someone who is interested in me for who I am, who is thinking about me the way I think about them. I finally want to find love, but I'm tired to be the only one investing the effort. Same goes about friendship.

I overthink very much about that. It seems so easy for others. When it comes to conversations, there are moments when my mind turns blank and I have no words to say. I hate group talks as there are topics I can never talk about or when there is, I can't find my turn to start talking. 

That feeling got stronger a month ago when I was at a jam session at my college. It was a small event for students in the evening. I played piano there. I talked to some of them in the past. The listeners were close to the players and sat in a semicircle. I was a bit further away because of the instrument. As you thought not a single soul dared to talk to me. I left earier, as I felt kinda off. I wanted to say bye to people I talked to in the past, but they seemed not to hear me somehow. One of them said bye. Someone said I'm overthinking on that. And there are some days when I think it's true, but what if not

I'm not charismatic enough to get that kind of friendship with others, I guess.
There was also once a situation in a group setting at the jam session where a guy started massaging the head of a girl randomly, as she was sitting. They were friends. I can NEVER imagine that it will ever happen to me one day. Absolutely never. I was jealous... you can call me a bad person for feeling that. I know I should be happy for them, but still...

I feel kinda lonley or unwanted...

Now I just want to hug someone... please 

Thank you everyone for reading, maybe it sounds relatable to you in one way or another. 
Have a great day

2025 November 23: Dear Diary,

Silly ideas come to me out of nowhere. A few days ago I had the idea to adapt a book that I love into a movie. Movies are perhaps my favourite medium of art, but they have always seemed so hard to make. When I was in film classes I could never understand the technical side of things, and that was just for the discussion of films. Actually starting to work on a film would take a lot of effort and I would not even know where to begin.  
  
At the moment I need to work on my own writing to get myself out there. I have a few novella and short story ideas that I should be working on at the moment. In the future I will probably try to adapt the book I love into a screenplay. If I can find a director to help me make it and if we can get the rights to the original work then that would be wonderful. If I can not do this then it would still be good to learn how to adapt a book into a screenplay.  
  
My brain is quite scattered. Focusing on one topic at a time can be quite hard to do. I already have many novella and short story ideas and now I have ideas for screenplays. Patience is something that I must master if I want any of these ideas to work well.  
  
Sincerely,  
  
Torinico

2025 November 22: Dear Diary,

On the topic of being more of my authentic self I somewhat bonded with one of my coworkers today. At the end of the night we talked about longer works of literature. I mentioned my plans to read War and Peace next month and the Tale of Genji later, both of which she enjoyed. She mentioned how Don Quixote was a great long work of literature.  
  
I am very happy that I got to have a conversation with someone. Typically I am quite nervous and reserved so it is a nice change to actually hold a conversation where I am sure it was enjoyable. Often I get worried that I have done something wrong despite there being no evidence, but I do not see that in this.  
  
Things are changing in my life. I am becoming the person I want to be and succeeding in doing so. Leaving my worries behind is something that is not only possible, but something that makes the most sense. For this I am grateful to the wonderful Universe.  
  
Sincerely,  
  
Torinico

Leaving a 10 year relationship that I didn't want to leave, but honestly I had no choice.. almost a year later and it still hurts. In those 10 years we never talked about marriage, unless our child brought it up, but he would dismiss it. He jumped into a relationship immediately. I went to therapy and eventually met someone. The man is great, he is so affectionate, he literally does anything for me, he is great in bed, etc. He keeps bringing up marriage and even asking what rings I like... sounds great right It is...  but I can not help that I still love my ex... things were horrible.. if I went in to detail, people would ask if I'm insane for loving him. I can't help it. My therapist says "it just shows your feelings were real, and it's ok to move on before being fully healed, because you can't fully heal until you developed new boundaries, memories etc in a relationship with someone safe. What is not okay is jumping into someone immediately without even trying to do the work. You sat with the feelings, you cried, you tried, and you sought help. He just took everything into the next relationship." 

Which is true, they've split at least twice already. Why can't I just shut off my feelings and be so fully devoted and happy to the man who actually wants to be with me I'm just writing to myself, I don't know where to put these thoughts, feelings, etc.

there is a boy in my life recently, i only met him some days ago online, but, he is already very unique in my life. he doesnt speak to me the way others have before. he listens a lot, seems to have good intention of knowing me as a person. he lets me be upset with him, him listens to why i feel or think things, he also admits if he is wrong. hes also convinced me to make better decisions for respecting myself and recentering myself. today, when i got home, my father yelled at me drunk, got very violent and abusive and had me crying and yelling. i had my phone in my hand the whole argument. near the end i looked at my phone screen and saw i was on a video call with the boy. his side was dark and my camera was on. i felt my heart drop realizing he heard all of the yelling, and it just made me sit down and cry more. i hurried and hung up. he messaged and asked me if i was okay, even just sent my name after two minutes i didnt reply. i apologized for calling him and that it was an accident. its funny cause its actually how we met the first night, i had just got yelled at and told him about that, but now he witnessed the reality by chance. after i told him the call was an accident he told me it was fine. he told me i deserve to beat up my dad, and that he should learn to speak to me correctly. he urged me to move out. he also asked me later if i was okay now, i told him i was better. he said send a photo to prove you arent crying, that was so important to me, if someone didnt care they would never ask that. so i send a video of my eyes showing they are dry. he said perfect and just kept making sure i am okay and saying that i need to move because it is not worth it to be treated badly and hounded. i told him i will, and i really will move as fast as possible. i deserve peace and comfort. i am thankful for valentyn.

December 21st , 2024

it matters where you are
there are people who let the distance of the world hold them from what they what
or their fear from what they want 
and in that, they only hurt other people.
they wont admit the reality of why they are standoffish 
they just leave you to feel like your wrong, messed up, or that its out of your hands, because thats just the way the world is

and maybe the reality is they just didnt feel the same as you, but theres a sneaking suspicion, they do, but you dont deserve it.

and sometimes, that person was the person to make it click for you. you finally realized from their loving treatment which wont ever be the same now, just what you wanted and what you deserve. 

theres always that question of what do you want in a partner, and its so hard to answer when youve never been treated fairly, or been seen. 

but then you FINALLY get that, and you think life is panning out correctly, maybe this is your time. they bring you joy and you feel that you do the same. but then the day comes and you hear that fateful goodbye again, the one disguised as a we are still gonna be the same, but those few words crush your ambition. 

youll find your person one day, just be yourself. 

and you feel like being no one, ever again.

Dear diary, 

my luster for life is starting to return. Ive found it in the things I loved when I was younger. No we cant hit the rewind button but sometimes we can go back to places that remind us of happy times. Through a movie or music or a physical place that brings us joy. Its okay, I think I ventured off the path a little bit and took a detour. But it rounded and led me back to where I started. I can always start again. Thats what its all about right Trial and error Truth be told I have no idea what Im doing, but I dont think that matters much anymore. Im focused on happiness, there are some days I wont feel so good. There are days that I wont feel or look my best. Its okay, we all have those days. I think the most important thing is that Im still here. I wont give up on myself. I love my people and my people love me. Thats more than anything I could have ever asked for.

My husband and I got married last February. 6 months ago, I moved to his country and left the comfort of my life in my home country just so we could be together. I started working 2 months ago but ever since I moved here we barely see each other. It got worse when we decided to move out of his parents house because I don't want to live with his narcissistic mom. So he works from 2pm to 1am then does Uber from 3am to 7am on Mondays to Fridays and 10am to 4pm every Saturday if they have overtime while I go to work from 8am to 4pm Monday to Friday. The only time that we get to see each other on a weekday is during the 15-minute drive to my work. Dont ask about the weekends because most of the weekends, his mom will drag us anywhere. And when his mom does not drag us anywhere, hes on his computer playing games as per him that he needs to unwind and relax. We share 5050 in our household bills tho he needs to work overtime because his salary cannot pay his other bills condo unit, car loan amp; personal loan alone.

I have already suggested to him to look for a job that will pay more to settle all his dues without doing overtime but he dont want that and told me that he do not have the time to do it since he needs to Uber after work and do not have the mental capacity to look for a job or to know what he wanna do as his mind is on how he can get us out of his debt. I also suggested that if he do not want to look for another job then he must cut out his expenses by selling his condo so that with it, we can pay off his debt and he can focus more on making a career path for himself, but again he told me that he do not have the time to do the documents needed for his condo.

It gets frustrating spending the first year of our married life like this. If I only knew that we wouldn't be spending time with each other like when we were in a long-distance relationship, I would not have migrated sooner and left the comfort of my life in my home country. Back home, I have my car, my business and most especially my mom. I don't know if this is leading to resentment but I am so upset that he is not being a husband to me by doing romantic things like going out on a date or anything. I miss feeling like a woman. Every time I ask him to go out, I still need to force him to agree. I have opened this up with him a lot of times but it feels like were just running in circles having the same talk each month.

What I hate about everything is that I am having a thought of cheating or looking for someone who will make me feel like a woman. I hate myself for having that thought considering that I came from a relationship where I was cheated on and here I am thinking of doing what my ex did to me. Also, I hate the thought of like giving my ex the benefit of the doubt that maybe he did what he did because I was lacking for him, that I am not enough for him even though I gave him my best. And thats also the same reason that I am giving my husband right now, I can see that he is doing his best but how about my needs and feelings I don't know if I am right or wrong to feel this way. 

I am not sure if I want to hear any advice as my head is so clouded right now but I just want this off my chest.
