I 29F recently separated from my husband and I am happily ready to start hooking up with people but havent yet. I am bisexual but have not yet had any FF experiences.

I have been flirting with the new guy at work 30M, let's call him Wade, and things had been hotting up. I wanted to be open and tell him about my situation and that im dtf but didnt get the chance. Also in our team is Wade's long-time friend Daisy 43F who I've been working closely alongside all year.

Our whole team went out drinking and clubbing last night and it did not go as I expected. Half of the night Wade and I continued our flirting as we had been, but after we started doing coke he quickly became black-out, non-verbal level intoxicated. For the rest of the night it was clear he could only focus on Daisy. I had already suspected they have been casually sleeping together for a while.

Meanwhile, Daisy spent lots of the evening being extra attentive and sweet to me. Ive been suspecting from her behaviours at work that she has been crushing on me. After the rest of the team went home the three of us went to Wade's house. I felt Daisy was keen on exploring something spicy all together, and I seriously considered it. But it felt wrong knowing Wade was so intoxicated and I just dont feel any attraction towards Daisy, for lots of reasons but mainly our age gap. I fell asleep on the couch and the other two slept in bed together. They might have had sex but idk for sure. 

Daisy left early in the morning and Wade and I spent the most awkward morning together. He told me he blacked out for most of the night. He then asked me straight up about my husband and kids, which wasn't a secret but I hadn't been open and honest like I intended. That seemed to make up his mind about me. I felt so deflated. I have been crushing on Wade for weeks, I finally was alone with him, in his house, I genuinely fucked up, messing around with him without being honest.


TLDR: My crush is in love with another girl, who has a crush on me, which led to an awkward threesome opportunity and lots of hang-xiety.

What did you say You're not talking to me if you're in a different room. Rooms filled with emotions,  traumas unspoken, everything is broken, shattered to pieces...

    Wanted...needed peace and quiet, a life of happiness but ended up with some distorted, twisted, mentally insane riot.

   You were you and I was I, souls connected for eternity, the undeniable tug, the never ending pull....my love, my love are you there Understanding with just one stare, no one will ever compare...fuck this cold air, can't seem to get warm, you used to say I was on fire, that my skin burned.

  I sat with an old woman the other day, she spoke of her husband and told me she had been alone for 20 years, he died suddenly and life isn't fair. It's all a stupid test, to see who can survive the fucked up game, that you one day just ended up in, I sat there everyday questioning my sanity amd and begging to be woken up...thinking e I'm just Alice or Dorothy and any second I would wake up and it will have juat been some fucked up nightmare I was in.

   This house is alive, it needs a name, it definitely needs some meds because the mood swings of it are unreal. I feel like they peeled back my scalp inserted things into brain that shouldn't be there so I could here every echo, every voice of the house...still don't know if I'm alive or dead, maybe in a coma or in a different dimension. All I ever feel in this house is tension....is it a man or a woman Definitely has more than one personality so there's men, women, children and zombies.

11:11 on the clock, make a wish, time for a change. Because this place is deranged, everyday is the same, groundhog day, never lived life feeling so strange more and more as each day passes. 

The neighbor mows the lawn everyday, steals our electricity and invades our brains with radio waves. WaaaaWaaaaWaaaaaa expanding then releasing. Why at 4 a.m. is this place freezing. 

   You come in, from wherever you disappeared to all day...not sure where you're at, couldn't really say, all I know is this place is not okay, night and day, there is no fun, there is no play. Hey baby I say to you, uneasy in a way. Unsure if your eyes will be black or the real you busting through the spell...I cannot tell just yet, how do you feel now I feel like our life is a live movie set, we have no control of the next scene...I tell myself someday I'll have the answers and our life will once again be happy and normal...maybe if we have a lobotomy. 

Now I sit with a tear filled, blank stare....I can feel you, I feel your presence but I can't see you....spraying on your cologne so I don't feel alone, dancing around with your spirit every night, hugging you tight, with my head on your shoulder...in this moment I only forget for a second that you're gone forever...then I think back to the old woman and her being alone for 20 years since her husband passed away and realized if I  live to be 80 then I'll double her 20.
I also wonder who is gonna help me get rid of the bodies when our daughter keeps accidentally ending every creeps life just for the fun of it when she's 17. I guess I better start working out and lifting weights.

Its been a hard week for me, dealing with my family, personal struggles, problems. Lots of things happening all throughout my life. Im exhausted. I feel so lonely even at times I am with my friends, and also i have not been able to vent out to anyone recently because ive also been keeping tabs on how they are before saying something that may affect their own mental health as well. So i just had to keep it to myself. But lately its been so so heavy. I just need an outlet to let it out. Let some out. I hope somebody feels when im not at my best even if i dont have to tell them, sometimes i wish someone would check up on me just because. Because randomly, i do it too to my close friends.. I cry myself sometimes, because i am so so tired, of adjusting every single time. Sometimes i want to let it all out and scream to my brother, to my mom, but then it all comes down to me considering again the health condition of my mom, what she would feel if she witnesses me having a dreadful argument with my brother. How i wish i lack the empathy, to feel what others would feel if i did what i did, said what i said. So that i could do anything without feeling the guilt. But no, its always hard for me. My partner is also struggling so I really have no guts to tell him ive been feeling this way for a while now, im trying to figure things out on my own, just so that i wont affect his mental health as well. I wanted him to live his life as well so, as much as possible i dont want to be a hindrance. I know its selfish that i do not get to tell him what i am going through right now, but he is also on a mental state that hardly I cannot explain as well, he is also in a dark place. Im thinking if we both go talking about these things right now it might affect him more than myself. I just hope everything ends well with me, and also with him, i mean our problems. Sometimes i wish i could leave home, and think about myself.. just myself. So that i could focus on my healing, Actually, ever since the pandemic came, its been a roller coaster ride for me, and ive been so so so so so tired of being strong for my mom, for the family, weve been arguing every now and then, and Im hurting to see these things happening. When my dad was alive everything was so much lighter even when there were a lot of problems. But after he passed 3 years ago, i have to step up, to take care of my mom, and the relationships in this family. Its just so exhausting, and ive been telling my mom always, that if it was not for her i would not be staying at this house. I just really want to look after her, i just cannot let her be. For years now ive been wanting to live separately but considering my moms old age i just cant let her be alone, my siblings has their own family too, so they really cannot look after her all the time, so i have to sacrifice, again just like when my dad had been hospitalized. I am the youngest but i feel like ive been doing so much, so so so much for the family even before.. I always have to be the mediator between the arguments, the fights, misunderstandings, i always do the job. Its so draining. sometimes i just want to shout at them and walk away. Sometimes i want it all to end kasi hirap na hirap nako. Id rather be at some other place than the house except when my mom needs me, because i can avoid everything. Im just so tired. My heart aches everytime im at the house, it does not feel like home anymore It makes me sad to feel this way, but that is what i really feelSana matapos na lahat ng to

After all this silence, when I saw you again,  
you looked even prettier than before.  
As if time has been painting you gently,  
while I stood still, just watching.

The wind must have learned its grace from your walk,  
and the sun its glow from your smile.  
Every glance of yours felt like poetry unspoken,  
every breath of mine, just waiting for you.

I saw the sparkle in your eyes,  
like constellations drawn only for me to lose.  
Your laughter spilled like music in the air,  
a melody I wanted to listen inside too.

Even the silence around you spoke,  
like soft prayers whispered to the sky.  
And in that moment, I knew again  
you are the reason beauty feels divine.

You were a dream dressed in daylight,  
a verse my heart kept rewriting.  
And I, the quiet witness of your beauty,  
clinging to moments that were never mine.

Nous y sommes. Ce vendredi, ma compagne met fin  notre relation. C'est dure mais a signe pour moi, le dbut d'une nouvelle vie qui sera superbe. Non pas que je ne l'aimais pas, bien au contraire, je suis dvast. Mais cette femme superbe et intelligente a eu le courage de dire stop  un situation qui nous faisait souffrir tous les deux, moi en premier.

Je ne sais pas aim et je ne sais pas tre aim. Tout a menait a une relation o nous nous convenions parfaitement mais qui tait bancale et commenait a devenir destructrice

Je ne sais pas encore  qui d'adresse ce texte, si moi seul en aurait connaissance  Si mes proches pourront le lire  Ou mme plus largement  Je l'cris car je dois tout comprendre et peut-tre sera-t-il mon tmoignage. J'aimerais l'imaginer similaires aux "Confessions" de JJ ROUSSEAU mais si je ne changerais jamais la face du monde comme il a pu y contribuer

J'ai besoin de comprendre ce vide qui m'habite et qui me dtruit en btissant des relations bancales voir toxiques. Besoin de savoir quel part prend mon enfance,  quel point ma prcdente relation toxique m'a marqu et chang, quelles proportions la culture masculiniste prend dans les comportements.

Besoin de dcouvrir la part du vraie amour que j'prouve  l'gard de Angeline et celui que je qualifie de faux qui n'est l que pour combler un vide

Besoin de poser sur papier  la fois ce qui se passe en actuellement, l'opposition entre ma motivation  aller vers une vie meilleure et cette tristesse d'avoir perdue la femme de ma vie.

  
A plus de 40ans, J'ai tout pour moi dans cette vie, sauf celle que j'aime... J'ai un trs bon travail et un trs bon salaire. une maison avec piscine. 3 superbes enfants d'une relation qui c'est finie il y a un an dans le chaos et je suis encore dedans a sera l'objet de posts et mme la sant  Que demander de plus et pourtant un vide m'habite. 

  
Je dois le comprendre

I have been hesitating about whether to return the tea I bought online for a refund. The product I bought was labelled Jin Jun Mei, but tasted like Lapsang Souchong. Seller sent me a UPS print label for me to ship it back free.

But my dilemma is, if I try to find another one online, there is still the risk that it would not be what I expect it to be, unless maybe I go up two or three price levels to increase my chances of getting what I want. 

So I am not sure if I should I settle for what I have right now. I am not a fan of the signature bold smoky flavor of lapsang souchong, but maybe I would grow to like it.

She wasnt the best to me, but she was the only one that stayed for so long. No matter how much I tried I couldnt change my bad habits. I miss the company, having someone I thought I could open up to, show my true self to, show that I was never a perfect person, or a perfect man. But in spite of that I would drive hours to see her, try my best to change, yet I failed. I couldnt change, because Im still fighting battles from the past, reliving all these moments every day, and struggling with my insecurities. I miss someone telling me things will be okay, having someone to go home to. I dont go out anymore, I just work and stay home because I dont know what else to do anymore. Nothings made sense since everything happened. I havent felt the same or any better, and I just push back the negative thoughts, the trauma. She gave me a reason to push forward, and slowly, all of those reasons crumbled. Im just lost. She wasnt the best but she was the only one to give me any time.

The urge of asking someone "you love me right"
And knowing the answer would be yes
The urge of running quick to him and hide myself into his arms
And knowing that he would hold me back
The urge of looking into his eyes with my eyes speaking all my miseries 
And knowing he would tell me everything will fall into place
The urge....the urge of holding a hand 
And knowing he would hold my heart in his breath.
The urge....the urge of loving someone with all my heart
And knowing that from his blood and soul, he would love me back .

The one thing we can't get back in this life is time. So why is it I should waste my time filtering out people who doesn't deserve it. I am a queen,  I  was born that way and can't help it. Many people think that they are less than, I'm not one of them. I am deserving of everything I need and want, weather it is to be taken or given.

I dont ask for much from life,  
all I want is your hand in mine,  
to walk through the universe together,  
to speak a thousand stories with just our eyes.

I wish to become the echo of your anklets,  
to belong to you like the bindi on your forehead,  
lose myself in the softness of your words,  
and run my fingers through your windy hair.

Let me turn your shadows into shelter,  
your sadness into laughter,  
your dreams into fortresses guarded by my sleepless nights.  
For every small smile of yours,  
I would offer the whole world without regret.

I want my mornings lit by the glow of your face,  
my silences filled with the music of your laughter.  
If anger finds you, Ill stay quiet,  
pouring only love into the cracks of your storm.

I want to erase every tear with my smile,  
to make your laughter the rhythm of my heart,  
to live not just with you,  
but with the very essence of your presence .

I have always been yours  
say just one word, and forever will be sealed.  
For you are the queen of my world,  
and I wish to be the crown upon your soul.
I think he was sorta flirting w me Im not sure. He is a big grown man and im just 22 but it made me feel something. Something really deep within me...

Im a really big fan of me to an almost narcissistic degree, I really really like me and I can do no wrong in my own eyes. There are few things about me I genuinely dont like and one of those few things is the fact im human, its not something I can change or work with, there's nothing I can do about it. Being human isnt a bad thing, i just feel like I could do better.

I have many faults, I know i do im only human, even if I dont see them as faults I know they're there. Im not okay with it, im okay with the faults I do have since to me im basically perfect, Im not okay with other people not knowing im perfect. That can't really happen tho considering perfection doesn't really exist and is just an opinion. I want other people too see me and love me the way I see me and love me.

I crave attention, companionship, and understanding from other people. Which is kinda weird considering the fact I don't like people, infact I find people to be disgusting and overall unpleasant. I am I hypocrite, I am disgusting and overall unpleasant but like its okay when I do it.

I feel genuinely superior to other people in a way that I can't completely explain but I know has no actual logic or reason behind it. I want other people or atleast on other person to feel and know im superior and perfect, i want them to feel like im a god. But that can't really happen. 

I supposed I could create someone, I could have a child and groom them into believing it, or I could have someone fall in love with me and try to convince them of it. The child wouldn't know any better and the person would hopefully be too blinded by love to notice im lying to them.

 If god is real, i wonder if this is how he feels, if this is the reason we were created, he wanted someone else to realize how beautiful and perfect he was. I wonder if he knows how selfish that is but were his creations and his children, if he can why shouldn't he Or maybe god is more like an author, we're so beneath him we're not even real, hes not really hurting anyone just creating stories and playing with his toys, maybe our feelings are so lowly he doesn't know hes hurting us and even if he does know he can't quite understand the extent. 

It doesn't really matter much, we'll probably never find out. I kinda want to be a god, but thats not possible. I'll have to settle for grooming and manipulating someone into think im a god, if someone believes im a god does it really make me one I dont think it does but I can pretend, its the closest ill get after all.

Now I choose to love you in silence,  
In silence I find no rejection.  
I will look at you from a distance,  
Not far away that I cant see you,  
But a distance from where you couldnt see me.

I will talk to you in my thoughts,  
In my thoughts I wouldnt be worried about what you will think of me.  
I will hold you in my dreams,  
For in dreams, you will never walk away.  
I choose to keep you in my heart,  
From where, you will always be mine.

I will smile when I see you laugh,  
Even if that laughter isnt meant for me.  
I will pray for your peace every night,  
Even when mine refuses to stay.

I will write to you in poems Ill never send,  
Hide them between pages that no one will ever read.  
I will keep your memories safe in my silence,  
Like a secret I never wish to lose.

I will listen to the songs you loved,  
Till they no longer hurt but hum softly inside me.  
I will whisper your name to the stars,  
As if the universe might still carry it to you someday.

I will stand where you once stood,  
Feel the air you once breathed,  
And in that small, fleeting presence   
I will find you again, quietly.

Now I choose to love you in silence,  
Not because I gave up,  
But because silence is the only place left  
Where I can still call you mine.

I dont know what to do with everything going on. Maybe i am a pushover like people say because i let her have her way. So here i sit alone watching the leaves fall and wonder if its worth fighting any more.

Ill start this journal with the thing that bothered me more than it should have.

Ive been unsettled by my recent conversations with J, and today I finally tried to untangle why. It wasnt a single momentit was a slow accumulation of tiny misalignments that eventually tipped into irritation.

First, to be fair: not everything she said was meant to attack me. Some of my discomfort came from my own history. When I told her I dont usually talk to younger people, that came from my experience of dating someone older when I was 19. That relationship made me hyper-conscious of power dynamics and the responsibility that comes with age. We had a good conversation about that. I agreed with her, and I know shes an adult capable of making her own decisions.

But the rest They made me squint at our exchanges with suspicion. And I got tired of squinting real quick.

Js energy is extremely sexualflirtatious, explicit, over-the-top. As you would expect from someone in their early twenties. Normally, that wouldnt bother me. Im vulgar myself. I flirt, I joke, Im not prudish. But the difference is: I know when to match energy and when to hold back. I dont machine-gun sexual comments into every gap in the conversation. I dont turn everything into kink talk just because I can.

But okayshe kept bombarding me with her TMIs. None of it was particularly disturbing, so I let her be. Eventually I thought, fine, Ill share a little of my own TMI.

I brought up how I had this favorite nude photo of myself with an ex amicable breakup. How I loved that photo and how I wanted to turn it into an art portrait. I mentioned an artist Ive followed for years who does nude art commissions tied to her thesis on empowering women, especially those whose nude photos were leakedhow they were exposed and then blamed for it, punished for taking photos of their own bodies. I went on to say I regretted deleting all my nudes because well, Moira Rose from Schitts Creek said it best:

gt;Take a thousand naked pictures of yourself now. You may currently think, Oh, I'm too spooky, or, Nobody wants to see these tiny boobies. But believe me, one day you will look at those photos with much kinder eyes and say, Dear God, I was a beautiful thing

Ive believed this since college. Ive always loved boudoir photos, nude art, and all that.

Then she responded:

Damn, youre fine sharing your nude with a random artist

And,

Why did you think she would draw you with a cock in your mouth

I explained the thesis againempowerment, reclamation, art as resistanceand she replied with:

Thats a way to empower women lol.

All while she talked freely about her own kinks.

What bothered me wasnt the sexual contentit was the lack of depth behind it. I brought up something thoughtful and vulnerable, like how nude photography felt empowering to me, how art can reclaim shame, and she responded with sarcasm, kink-bragging, and shock value. It felt like I was offering introspection and she was offering performance.

I hated that it bothered me this much. I wanted to understand why she didnt view it as empowering, because maybe I was missing a perspective. And I genuinely wanted to learn something from someone youngermaybe she had a fresh angle. She tried a bit, I guess. She asked what the artists work was about which I had already explained. She asked what I expected from the portrait.

But the energy felt off. Sarcastic. A little passive-aggressive. I wanted to understand her viewpoint, but I lost all appetite for the conversation. I let her gush about the girl shes in love with and just checked out.

Its exhausting.

And it hit methese past few days, I dont think I gain anything from these conversations. Not insight, not connection, not warmth. She said she really enjoyed the deep conversations we had at the start. Well, if thats the case, I dont think shell mind if I pull away, because the TMI-heavy, sexual, masturbation-centered conversations arent serving me anymore. As much as I enjoy talking about those things, they get boring for me quickly.

I had hoped to learn something from her perspectivesomething fresh or challenging. But the truth is, her age shows. Not in a bad way, but in a natural, developmental way. Shes 23. Shes supposed to be chaotic, reactive, flirtatious, defensive, and a little morally rigid. Thats what your early twenties look like.

But Im 33. And no, that doesnt mean Im above herit just means Im not in that phase anymore.

I can be chaotic too, in how I think, in how I thrive in gray areas. But I really dislike sarcastic, dismissive energy. I love well-intentioned debatebut lets do it calmly, with introspection, without mockery. The goal is to learn from one another, to notice perspectives we didnt see before.

Its only been a couple of days, but Im tired of forcing myself to keep up with an energy that doesnt suit me.

I dont dislike her. Im not angry. Im not judging her. If anything, Im more annoyed at how much this is bothering me today. But Im recognizing that she isnt someone I can have the kinds of conversations I wantlayered, calm, reciprocal, open, reflective. Shes in her phase of loud expression, and I want her to enjoy it. But Im in my phase of quiet understanding. Theres no shame in that.

I need softness. I need curiosity. I need emotional intelligence. I need maturity. I need conversations where both people are actually listening. I need all of that in this tumultuous season of my life. Im done with the loud. I want slow and calm. My nervous system certainly needs it.

So I think Im ready to step back. And honestly, I dont think shell mindor even noticeif I do.

On a calmer notetodays borrowed solitude.

I had the house to myselfwell, the first floor, at least. My siblings stayed up past three in the morning, and I guess thats why my sister wasnt up when I left my room and went downstairs to the kitchen.

Im still exhaustedas always. Whats new But I had just enough energy to whip something up for myself and then cook dinner for the family. Probably not the ideal choice, but I ate fire noodles before starting dinner prep.

I had my mellow playlist playing on the TV. It felt peacefulthe music, the quiet house, me preparing my fire noodles with scrambled eggs and hotdogs yeah, I know not healthy, pero djame vivir hoy. Moments of borrowed solitude always make me wonder if Ill feel this same softness when I finally live alone for realfor months, maybe years. Maybe yes. Maybe there will be stretches of loneliness too. I dont know yet.

For now, I just need these tiny pockets of borrowed solitude. For some reason, in moments like this, I notice that I can actually sit through my racing thoughts long enough for them to settle. Or maybe I simply stop caring that theyre racing. Im just sitting with themside by side, not fighting anything.

I like this.

Im still exhausted, but I can feel the heaviness slowly dissipating from my body. And I realize: when Im secure enough, Im going to enjoy living alone. Ive always been a loner, and solitude really is my element. One day definitely one dayIll be stable and confident enough to live on my own, and Ill trust myself to handle everything that comes with it.

I can even have moments like this, I thought. Where I pause in the middle of whatever Im doinga chore, anythingand write down my thoughts for the days journal. Whether I write it tonight or not.

I like being alone with myself, letting the calm music carry me wherever it wants.

Every now and again the messages I saw come back to mind and I break down and bawl my eyes out, alone. I wasn't supposed to find those messages. It sucks because I still love him, I still want to marry him, but why does it have to be this way When I think about how turbulent this engagement year has been, I fear that this is what our marriage will be. I don't want that. I don't want to feel like I'm sharing him with others. I want him all to myself, is that so bad

What's pathetic is that he could truly break my heart...and I'd still love him with the pieces.

Lately it feels like Im always the one packing up - physically, emotionally, mentally. I keep drifting between places and people, trying to figure out where I actually belong. Theres this strange mix of wanting to stay, wanting to go, and wanting someone to just say, Youre meant to be here.

Im tired of living in transit. I just want a place - and a person - who feels like home

You stayed when I was breaking things I didnt understand,  
when my silence cut deeper than my words would ever pretend,  
You carried pieces of me I threw away myself,  
and called it love  even when it burned your hands.

You hid your tears behind gentle smiles,  
kept your pain quiet so I could scream mine.  
I thought your patience was weakness,  
but it was the strongest thing Ive ever seen alive .

You were light walking beside a storm,  
and I was too blind to see the way you trembled.  
You gave me peace while I gave you chaos,  
and still, you never left until I made you go.

Now I sit with the ghosts of your kindness,  
and every memory feels like an apology too late.  
If I could meet you again, Id say just this  
I see what you did for me,  
and Im sorry I couldnt see it then.

Every next day, when I see her,  
she looks prettier than yesterday.  
Maybe its not her  maybe its the way  
my heart still remembers what it feels like to stay.

I see her laugh from a distance now,  
a sound Im no longer a part of.  
The world moves around her so easily,  
while mine freezes in the moment our eyes dont meet.

There was a time when her voice  
used to be home.  
Now its just an echo I chase  
through empty corridors of memory.

I tell myself Im fine,  
that Ive learned to live without her,  
but every night, when silence gets too loud,  
her name still finds its way through my chest.

I wish I could tell her  
how it feels to breathe beside her again   
not to hold her, not to ask her to stay,  
just to exist in the same air  
without falling apart.

Every next day, when I see her,  
she looks prettier than yesterday   
maybe its just me  
learning to miss her in new ways.

I love her   
not just for her beauty,  
but for the peace she hides between storms.

I want her,  
not like a possession,  
but like a prayer that never leaves the lips.

I want her eyes   
those endless oceans that hold both fire and mercy,  
that light of dawn which shatters the darkness.

I want her voice   
that melodic tone that feels like music,  
every word she speaks  
feels like my name finally learning its meaning.

I want her hands   
those gentle and firm hands   
not to hold them,  
but to understand how something so tender  
can carry the weight of the world.  
Hands that could calm even my shivering heart.   
I want to trace the lines of her palms,  
and see if destiny ever dared  
to write my name there.

I want her laughter   
that sunlight sound that wakes my dying days.  
I want her silence too   
it feels like a temple,  
a place where I could rest my tired faith.

I want her presence   
her soul that glows without trying,  
her kindness that could heal even gods.

I want her faith,  
her flaws,  
her fire   
every shade of her existence.

I dont just want her near me   
I want to live where her spirit breathes,  
in the rhythm of her heartbeats,  
in the warmth where her shadow leaves.

I want her   
not to keep, but to honor,  
not to hold, but to feel her light pass through me.

For in loving her,  
I finally understand   
some souls  
are meant to be worshiped,  
not owned.

Dear diary, I want to smash a glass bottle and slit my wrist. I want to hold another piece and squeeze it till the blood drips from my hand. My thighs are already covered in red zebra stripes; maybe I should add some more. While I cry in the shower in a puddle of my own blood, I will remind myself that nobody ever treated me with respect and kindness, and nobody ever will. In a world so cruel, with a heart full of love, but nobody to give it to. Please, don't fool me, don't lie to me, don't tell you love me, because daddy said I am not even attractive enough and that I am too dramatic. While I stare at the shower wall and let the warm shower droplets gently kiss my body, I wonder what it feels like to be held by my mom. And as my blood slowly slips away like my life, together with all the possible experiences I could have had, but I was too sad to even chase them, so now they are down the drain. With all the possible energy left in me, I stand up and grab a towel, sweeping away my tears, but as I see my disgusting body I weep again. People will define my pain as body dysphoria, but there is nothing really wrong with my body. It's the dirty hands of others staining my skin, the reminder that I am just a disgusting human in a society but not a pretty free butterfly...

Tonight feels different.  
Not because the world changed  
but because shes not in it anymore,  
not in the way my heart still searches for her.

She isnt here anymore  
not the way she used to be,  
not the way my heart learned to live.  
Her voice isnt my shelter now,  
her presence isnt the hand I reach for,  
and every corner of my life  
feels colder because of it.

I dont know how to return  
to the version of me that existed  
before she touched my world.  
Everything feels heavier  
my thoughts, my chest, my nights.  
Even the air hurts.

She was the thread holding me together,  
and now that thread has snapped  
I am unravelling, piece by piece,  
and no one is here to see.

I keep telling myself Ill survive,  
but even my lies have started trembling.  
Because the truth is simple, brutal  
without her, every day is just something to endure,  
not something to live.

She wont text.  
Now she will never ask if Im okay.  
She wont hold the version of me  
thats collapsing in the dark.  
My life was already a quiet hell,  
but at least she made the flames softer.  
Now it burns louder, hotter, closer  
and I have no one to save me from myself.

Every second without her  
feels like someone is dragging nails  
 inside of my heart.  
My mind keeps replaying her laughter,  
her care,  
the way she held my brokenness  
like it didnt terrify her or ever scare her.

She was the only person  
I could fall apart in front of.  
The only voice that could silence my storms.  
The only warmth I had in a world  
that is always too cold for someone like me.

And now the world feels colder than ever.  
Every room, every thought, every breath  
it all echoes with the truth  
Im terrified to accept:  
Shes gone.  
Not dead.  
Just gone from me.  
And it hurts more than death ever could.

I dont want to be strong.  
I dont want to move on.  
I dont want to pretend Im okay.  
I just want her.  
Her eyes, her voice, her comfort,  
her way of understanding me  
before I understood myself.

I am trying so hard not to fall apart  
but God,  
its so hard to breathe  
when the person who once held your heart together  
is now the reason its tearing itself apart.

And still  
in all this pain,  
in all this drowning  
one truth doesnt change:  
I still love her.  
Maybe too much,  
maybe enough to destroy myself,  
maybe enough to let her go  
even when it kills me.  
Because she deserves peace  
even if it takes mine with it.

I wanted her   
in the simplest, purest way.  
To wake up and see her face in the soft morning light,  
to trace constellations in her palm ,  
to talk about nothing until it started to mean everything.

I wanted to look into her eyes   
those diamond-bright, river-deep eyes,  
that make time stop breathing,  
To lose myself in them  
and forget that the world outside ever existed.

I wanted to feel her hands,  
those soft, gentle, steady hands   
the ones that looked like they were made to hold the world,  
and yet, could calm my chaos with a single touch.

I wanted to hear her laugh   
that unfiltered, bell-like sound  
that makes even silence want to dance.  
To see her bindi catch the sunlight,  
her earrings swaying like small stars,  
her hair flowing like a river that never ends.

I wanted to tell her that shes peace disguised as a person,  
That her soul glows even in the dark,  
that when she speaks,  
even the wind stops just to listen,  
and just her glance makes pain pass by

But life  
life decided to keep her at a distance.  
Not far enough to forget her,  
but just enough to remind me that she was never mine.

Now, I watch her from where she cant see me   
still perfect, still luminous, still divine.  
And though I cant hold her,  
I hold her presence like a secret prayer.

I talk to her in my thoughts now,  
listen to her laughter in echoes of memory.  
I love her quietly   
in ways shell never know,  
in places shell never look.

And maybe thats love too   
not the kind that asks,  
but the kind that accepts.  
Not the kind that demands to stay,  
but the kind thats grateful it ever existed.

She walks beneath the same sky,  
and maybe, somewhere between stars,  
my love still reaches her   
not to touch, not to change,  
just to say:  
I still see you.

Because some loves dont need forever.  
They just need a heart willing to keep loving,  
even from far away.

You never had to stay,  
but you did.  
When I was nothing more than noise and fear,  
you sat beside my silence  
and turned it into strength.

You held my trembling hands  
as if they were meant to be still.  
You looked at my chaos  
and somehow saw something worth saving.  
You gave me pieces of peace  
when you had none to spare.

Your voice  soft, steady   
became the bridge between my storms and calm.  
Your laughter was a light  
that taught me warmth could exist  
without fire.

I still remember how your eyes  
could quiet every ache inside me.  
How your kindness never asked for recognition,  
and your words  simple, honest   
felt like prayers whispered straight to my soul.

You carried me when I couldnt walk.  
You believed when I had stopped believing.  
You gave  and never once asked  
for anything in return.

If love had a shape,  
it would look like your patience.  
If grace had a sound,  
it would be your voice saying,  
Im here for you.

And even now   
when distance has turned your presence into memory   
I still thank you.  
Not for what you did,  
but for who you are.

Because you didnt just heal me,  
you taught me how to heal myself.  
You didnt just help me live   
you reminded me what life could feel like  
when its touched by someone good.

So this is my prayer,  
my apology,  
my quiet bow to you:

May every smile you gave me  
come back to you in brighter ways.  
May every pain you carried for me  
turn into something gentle.  
May every part of your heart  
find the peace it once gave to mine.

So  
thank you  for each and everything.  
For every day, every night, every time I needed you.  
Thank you for being here with me.  
Thank you for making me realize my strength.  
Thank you for helping me believe in my dreams again.  
Thank you for listening when no one heard my voice.  
Thank you for seeing my pain when no one tried to.

And most of all   
thank you for staying,  
when no one else did.

Thank you.  
Thank you for everything.

Please tell me this is just temporary.

We're still going to get married, right

the way we talked about forever

Painfully.

I am trying to forget you   
not because I stopped loving you,  
but because loving you now  
would only hurt you more.

I wake up every day and unlearn your name,  
like tearing petals off a flower  
that still smells like you.  
I try to bury the warmth you left behind,  
but it keeps blooming  
in every corner of my silence.

You were never mine   
I knew that from the start   
but my heart still built a home for you  
in places it shouldnt have.  
And now, every breath I take  
feels like walking through that empty house,  
hearing echoes that refuse to fade.

I still see you in the softest things   
the morning light, the sound of rain,  
the way the wind moves like a memory.  
I still hear your laughter  
in places it doesnt belong.  
And when the night grows too quiet,  
it feels like the world is asking  
why Im still holding on  
to someone whos already free.

So I am trying   
not to erase you,  
but to live with the ache of you.  
To let the love stay,  
but the longing go.

Maybe this is what real love means   
not having,  
but wishing well.  
Not holding,  
but protecting from afar.

And maybe one day,  
when I finally stop searching for you,  
in every sunset, every prayer,  
Ill find peace   
not because I forgot you,  
but because I learned  
how to remember you  
without falling apart.

I am in love with a soul that knows only love,  
a soul that may break itself  
but never let go of the ones it holds.

I am enchanted by a mind  
that shows kindness at every turn,  
that feels the pain of others  
as if it were its own.

I am the lover of a smile  
that is not bound to a face,  
but reaches the heart  
like a prayer softly answered.

I have learned to listen to the silence,  
for even there she speaks,  
her quiet mercy saying everything  
without a single word.

I adore the purity of her emotions,  
as sacred as a mothers love  
a love that only gives,  
never asks, never takes.

To live beside her soul  
is to discover my own existence,  
to breathe her breath  
is to build my world anew.

For in a single smile of hers  
my whole universe rests.  
She is no ordinary being  
she is a blessing,  
a prayer gifted to me by God.

And even if I forget myself,  
I only want to remain within her.  
Not with just her face,  
not with just her form,  
but with her soul  
that is where my love belongs

I Miss You

In my most silent days,  
I miss you the loudest.

 Though I was never the warmth of the sun  
you long for on a winter morning,  
nor the evening rain you dance within,  
nor the starlit sky that keeps you awake all night  
but you were all of these to me.

Your presence, your smile, was full of warmth and comfort,

I felt a gentle breeze on my face each time you blinked,  
saw sunlight gleam in your nose pin,  
watched your hair shine brighter than day  
after the rain had touched it.

Every word of yours still lives in my mind,  
every picture of you rests in my heart.

I miss you a lot   
when you asked me about my day,  
when your texts washed away my tiredness,  
when your voice turned frustration into calm.  
You made my incomplete thoughts whole,  
my unheard silence finally heard.

I really miss you a lot

I miss you every time a blink,

 I miss you every time a breath,

 I miss you every night thinking about you and just you,

I really miss your light which gave me hope,

I really miss our conversations, gentle as a mothers love.

I really miss that pretty face of yours,

but even more,  
I miss your soul  
the kindest, purest, most loving soul  
that showed me my own worth.

That love,  
which taught me how to love,  
though it was never mine  
I miss it.  
I miss you.  
I miss you a lot. lt;3

some days i feel totally fine, like im finally getting a sense of myself. then the next day i feel like im back at square one, questioning everything. my goals, my personality, the people around me, what i actually want for my future. its exhausting feeling this unsure about things that seem so obvious to everyone else.

Bear with me it's a long story.

I'll avoid names and details for obvious reasons,  but I have or had not sure yet a friend of 6 years, who just got a horrible divorce about a year ago, her ex-husband husband did something horrible that still boils me to this day, my friend after the divorce lost temporarily custody of her 5 kids but they managed to stay with family so in all not that horrible there at least, she became extremely depressed, almost all her friends turned their back on her by telling her that why didn't she noticed first and such horrible assholes. Seeing this and me knowing all that transpired I just couldn't just stand back, so I offered my help in everything I could, talks till 2 - 4 am, cooking, offering advice and support, etc. 

Fast forward 8 months after and we're talking more often and going out for coffee as she's finally starting to come out of the shell but still sensitive on a few days a week, so one day she decided to tell me that she's had a crush on me but never did anything out of fear of loosing my friendship, I won't lie I was expecting that at some point as I was starting to consider it also, but it wasn't the right thing to do, not while she was still recovering from the trauma of the divorce and all that entailed, so I told her: 

"You're an amazing woman, I won't lie I've thought about it more than once also, but I don't want to take advantage of you while you're still healing, I want you to focus on your kids for now and yourself, if in a month or two or whenever you feel ready, and you feel the same then ask me again and we'll go out and see where it leads"


 I do love her, and I realize that this was probably a stupid thing to do but I do have my reservations for being with people specially when kids are involved. 

When I was younger before I met her my girlfriendpartner of the time got pregnant, I was happy and ready to start a family, but she was scared or it looked like that to me, and she told me she wasn't ready, she was almost 3 months pregnant when we realized, so I told her that I understood that I wasn't going to force her even if I was ready and wanted it because she was the one carrying our daughter, so she aborted...
Our relationship never recovered, after a while one of her friends suggested to her that she should erase me from her life and she agreed, when she told me I was just numb and I just let her do as she wanted.

A year and a half later I see her in a city festival and she's with the "friend" that suggested she erased me from her life, and they're pushing a baby stroller... 

So now with my friend who I helped through her divorce and trauma, 3 weeks ago she calls me and  starts texting me how she got introduced to someone, that a friend insisted, well according to her, the guy is exactly like me. 
"He's like you, he has the same sense of humor and manners, he says the same jokes and behaves the same, it's like you but Asian" and such she tells me after she met him and they start texting. 

They go out for a date and she asks me to babysit her kids, I accept and I don't think too much about it as she told me it's just as friends, and during her date she says the same thing to me how he's just like me... They end up sleeping together the same night, and she tells me about it the same night when she picks up her kids as we talk in private so they don't hear, I play along and say that I'm happy for her that she had fun even if I'm dying on the inside, the worse part is that she tells me again at the end "he's really just like you, but for some reason I feel bad" .... 

We're supposed to talk soon, she knows my past and how my ex aborted my daughter, but she doesn't know the full context of it, well that's my story, I do blame myself for not being more assertive but I can't help it, and I thought she understood that after knowing me for 6 years... 

Well that's my story, fucked up and pathetic I know.

I know I'm not a good person, I hate cheaters and yet here I am falling into the category. Sure.. its a very long term relationship and we're more like roommates than anything these days, but that doesn't excuse that I am emotionally cheating.

I met you while gaming, we instantly hit it off. We quickly fell madly in love with each other, both completely new to this sort of thing, we both felt guilty yet it felt so right at the same time. Your husband started to notice things, you guys began to fight, this caused lots of stress in your life. Your family had health issues on top of that which added to the stress, you became overwhelmed trying to juggle everything - you just didn't quite have the capacity to reciprocate anymore - and thats completely okay.

  
It was hard for you to continue but you couldn't bare to let me go, we both didn't want to let go. I felt guilty and I truly still feel like it was the best choice to let you go to lessen the stress in your life, you couldn't make that decision so I had to for you, we agreed to be friends still and be in each others life but I can't even bare to think about you right now.

I just want to forget... I'm doing this because I love you dearly, more than I've ever loved anyone. I just want to see you happy.. but god damn am I just so sad right now. I miss you so much, but I NEED to forget. My heart aches :

No weird dreams last night, but I lay awake for about two hours, from 3:00 to 5:00 AM. I tried one of the guided meditations from my therapist, but unfortunately, my mind kept wandering to random or negative thoughts.

During dinner last night, I mentioned to my wife 46F that I was going to start therapy because Ive been feeling sad. I feel like maybe mentioning it was a mistake, because she kept asking me why I was stressed or depressed. I didnt want to go into details to avoid hurting her. Even though she was very nice to me about it, I tried to change the subject to how we can help our daughter with her schoolwork.

I feel guilty about my feelings. But I think I eventually need to tell her how I feel about our marriage. Im scared, and I havent made up my mind yetwhether I should keep things as they are and pretend to be happy, or separate and hope that my life could be better.

Im still terrified of losing my kids, my house, my savings, and my income Divorce is scary.

My next meeting with my therapist is on December 16th That feels pretty far away.

I started to get a headache this afternoon; I think its going to rain tomorrow. I took medication, but it didn't kick in at all. As I type this, my anxiety is rising. I feel like I need a big hug, but it feels hypocritical to seek comfort from my wife when I have these feelings.

F18 My house feels loud all the time but somehow lonely at the same time. I feel like I dont really fit in with my family anymore, and Im not sure why. Maybe Im changing, or maybe they are.

I hardly know where to begin. After a failed marriage in my early 20s, I got back out into the dating world and met a man who was very kind to me, spent his free time with me and my two kids, showed up to their events, and made himself a fixture in our lives. After having a child together and living together; things started to arise. 

He stopped being affectionate with me. I hug him, he doesnt hug back. I kiss him, rarely will he kiss back. Never holds my hand or puts his arm around me. Wont cuddle. Having said that, he still takes care of us all, helps around the house, and is affectionate with the children. Ive asked if he just isnt as attracted to me anymore but he states that if he didnt want to be with me hed let me know. But the lack of connection eats at me 

Couple that with a non existent sex life talking once every 2 months and Im struggling. I am a very sexual person and want to be able to enjoy my kinks with someone who is willing to try them and learn what we like together. He refuses anything remotely kinky. He seems almost offended that Im into different things. He is very vanilla, and even with me saying Id help him with whatever fantasy he has, or help him learn some things he rejects it. Im constantly wanting more and he just isnt into it. 

He also nit picks everything I do. I am far from perfect by any means, but If I dont rinse the bubbles out of the sink after washing dishes, I hear about it. If I dont put utensils away to his liking I hear about it. If I dont pick up the dogs mess outside as frequent as he would like me to, he makes remarks. Just seems nothing I ever do is to his standards, even though Im trying so hard to do everything he wants. He calls me a child if I am singing and dancing while cooking, or laughing at something he deems as not funny. 

But he went out of his way to buy a home for all of us to live in, and he helps me with chores, coaches kids sport teams and isnt afraid to help me with anything. He buys me little gifts and tries to be loving, even though it appears to be hard for him. He cares for me, and I him, but we cant seem to get past the intimate side of a relationship. Hell shut down if I even bring it up. 

I cant for the life of me decide if Im doing everyone a disservice by staying and working on things, and damaging each of us in the process and should try again or if finding a man who will care for me, while enjoying my personality, and exploring things is just too much to ask for for a mom of 3 at 30 so I should accept the goodness life has given me

Hi everyone.
Im Darya, Im from Moldova.

Today I want to talk about someone very special  my daughters teacher. Her name is Xenia. Shes only 21, but honestly, she was born for this job. Shes smart, kind, patient, and the kids absolutely adore her.

In Moldova we speak two languages  Russian and Romanian  and its surprisingly hard to find a qualified teacher who speaks Russian. Xenia does. Shes not even from Chiinu, the capital, but somehow we were lucky enough to get her.

My daughter loves her so much. Every morning she asks, Is Xenia there today our kindergarten has a shift system  one teacher in the morning, another in the evening. And all the kids literally run inside when they see her at the door.

Everything would be perfect except for one thing: her salary. She earns around 300 a month. Three hundred. Its insane. You cant live on that here  not with our prices. A coffee costs 2, a simple dress 20, renting a tiny one-bedroom apartment costs about 200 before utilities. Its impossible.

So Xenia is leaving. Shes going abroad to find a better life, and honestly, she deserves it. Shes talented, beautiful, smart  she shouldnt be struggling like this.

But when I found out she was leaving, I cried.
My husband and I talked about this possibility before, but we hoped it wouldnt happen so soon. I was just so happy that this amazing person was the one teaching my daughter. And now shes leaving, and I feel so sad and helpless about it.

What really breaks my heart is that this isnt just her story  its Moldovas story. Salaries are so low that soon there will be no teachers, no doctors, no young specialists left. Those are the foundations of society. And theyre falling apart.

I truly wish Xenia all the happiness she didnt get here. Parents appreciated her. The state didnt.

Thanks for reading. I just needed to get this off my chest.

2025 November 20: Dear Diary,

Today marks the first new moon since Halloween. Of course I will be meditating and making more moon water, but I must learn how to have more fun in celebrating. It would be very nice to gather friends in order to celebrate the sabbaths and moons. Having like-minded individuals share in the glory of the Universe.  
  
Besides celebrating the new moon, I also picked up some wine today. Beaujolais Nouveau day is today, so I picked up a bottle. I also got a bottle of Madeira as I have never tried it before. George Washington and Thomas Jefferson loved Madeira, so I thought it would be worth a try.  
  
May the Universe bless whoever reads this. The new moon is a time to remember that wherever we are in life it is not permanent. Starting over is not a tragedy, but a blessing. Invite, tonight, wonders you could never believe. For me I am inviting community and more willpower to read and write.  
  
Sincerely,  
  
Torinico

A silent promise.
A delicious risk.
A pull Im helpless to resist and unwilling to escape.

Today I 44M woke up at 5:00, alone in my bed. My wife 46F was sleeping with our daughter 10F because our daughter couldnt fall back asleep.

I dreamt again of a separation. I am still very conflicted about my feelings. I kept thinking about the dream and couldn't get back to sleep. In the dream, we had a friendly separation and were both happy in our own separate ways. The kids understood, and we were still able to talk about their education.

I know it is a dream and not reality. I dont want to hurt my wife, and if we did break up, Im afraid that she would be both sad and angry, and might try to hurt me. I still care about her.

My therapist told me that reality is 10 truth and 90 illusionthat my feelings might not be "real." I am confused about it. I need to look into this and read the documentation he gave me.

My wife left to drive our son to school, so I was alone with my daughter. We talked about her upcoming exam and how ready we were for it. Last night I helped her study for her history exam and I genuinely had a good time with her.

She asked me to check if her report card had arrived. While I hadn't received an email, I checked the parent portal to see if it was there. I told her I would wait until tonight to print it and show her. I knew the grades wouldn't be great; the exams she made us sign recently were poor, so it was expected.

My son 12M received his report card too, and it was very good in my opinion. However, I was stressed most of the day because I dreaded my wifes reaction to our daughter's report card. I checked it, and it was indeed very disappointing. Once I built up the courage to tell her, I printed it out. We talked about it and discussed how we could help our daughter. I must say, I am proud of how it went because we were both very calm.

When my daughter came home, the discussion with her went well. I could feel my wife losing patience, but I used a calm voice to try and align the discussion with more positivity. There were multiple times where I felt like my wife wanted to get angry, but I managed to keep the conversation calm.

Later, my wife asked my mom for her passport, and it stressed me out. I am afraid to commit to the trip to Europe right away. I feel like if I do, I will be forced to stay in this relationship and won't have any other options. I need to convince her not to buy the tickets before the New Year so that I can at least sort out my feelings.

I have a stomach ache tonight and feel like I might be getting a headache. I will try to go to bed early.

I will try to write tomorrow

Crazy to think Im almost 40, scary how fast the time has gone. I often wonder what path my life would have gone down if Id made better decisions when I was younger. Definitely live life to the fullest

Sincerely,  
  
Torinico

I dont have her picture, not her voice,
not the warmth of her beside me.
All I have is a pen she forgot in class
a small, ordinary thing
that smells like her softness,
her presence, her quiet.

I kept it.
Not because I couldnt return it,
but because it became the last piece of her
I could hold without breaking.

Some nights I press it between my fingers,
and it almost feels like holding her hand
not really,
but close enough for a heart
that has learned to live on almost.

This pen
it doesnt write words,
it writes memories:
her laughter, her calm,
the way she made my storms quiet
without even trying.

And maybe thats why
I never gave it back.
Because everything else slipped away
her voice, her presence, her light
but this pen stayed.

Neither her love nor this pen is mine,
but this is something she once touched,
I can hold this as a memory of her,
and as a reminder that she was here once,
close enough to touch,
close enough to change me,
close enough to leave
a fragrance that still lingers
long after she is gone

Someone leaving abruptly No replies, no good-byes. 

Lots of arguments for many days. Before breaking down forever 

Feeling like there is no heart that can ever break Cold and shielded. 

Or not knowing that the heart is breaking several times over and over again Right in front of your eyes.

Early, air still heavy with that pre morning quiet. Moved without thinking. Craving hit, sharp and specific, so I walked out into the cool streets and bought what I needed. Cooked the kind of breakfast that fills a room before it fills a stomach. It felt real. 

Then went for a run. A run that cut through the cold. Breath burning, legs steady, mind clearer than its been in weeks just the sound of my steps on the pavement. Shower heat dragged the edge off the chill. And tea anchored the moment.

Tea cooled beside me. Steam launched. That game the one left untouched after him waited like a room I had locked for too long. I entered it. Nothing collapsed. The past didnt reach for me. I rewrote the save by simply existing inside it again.

Were built from the people who brush past us. Their phrases, their strange little rituals, their way of leaning into a moment. They linger like dust in the corners until we decide to open a window. Today I opened it.

The anime will be watched. The song loops as sound alone, no shadow attached. His voice has thinned into nothing. It's time I share these memories with someone else.

I like being with myself more than I liked being with him. What I miss isnt him; its someone who can keep up with my thoughts and throw theirs back. That gap doesnt hurt. It just shows what I actually want.

New history will overwrite the old. Love works only when its learned together and I certainly will try what you have failed at; be warm again.

You enter her room from the dining area. As you'd take off your shoes she tells you not to cause she has to run  back for her favourite ring all the time as she's half foot out the door already...

The walls are smiling in her favourite colours, torqoise blue. Covered in the pictures of unknown Pinterest artists and the remains of her own paintings that survived her last manic episode in which she threw our most her art she has made throughout the years. 

On the left you'll see her child hood cabinet filled with pens and paint, some junk and her favourite tops. On top of it is her most cherished possession: The jewelery connection itself, crowned with her moms beautiful golden antique mirror. Nexto it is her night stand packed with clothes she thinks she'll wear again but really they're just napping before laundry. A blue vase guards their sleep with fake roses coming out it's mouth. It must be guarded cause the wardrobe warriors nexto them like to pick some fights. 

She has so many clothes all color coded like the ocd freak she is. It's okay at least shell know where to look, when sock number two from four Christmases ago is missing. Yes that's right... Her mom somehow took it. They'll laugh about it... Hmm laughter, the room has heard many.... Laughter, crier, manic screaming, drawing, hiding in panic...

On the right, stands her childhood bookshelf filled with a lifetime of knowledge,  her bags and favourite rings, keys and long forgotten texts...the second most important tenant rents the place nexto this: her table.  Owner and birther of most her art and proud holder of all her schoolbooks and marks... Her bed lies below the windows, covered with pretty pink see through curtains. It's her heaven, so soft and comfy, big enough not to ever make her want to leave it... 

Really when she thinks about it, it's big enough for two... But when, how and who ;

Hey everyone,
Recently Ive been having these thoughts like what if I had been born a girl and it kind of surprised me. The more I sat with that idea, the more I realized it brings up some complicated feelings for me  some curiosity, some confusion, and honestly, some excitement.

I want to be clear: I enjoy dating women and Im not questioning that. But Ive started wondering what it would be like to explore a more feminine side of myself, even if its just virtually or emotionally. Im not sure what this means for me identity-wise, and Im not making any big declarations  just trying to understand myself better.

So I guess Im wondering:
		Has anyone else gone through something like this
		How did you explore these feelings safely and honestly
		And is there a space or community where people are open to talking or even virtually dating in a more feminine vibe, just to see how it feels
		Or maybe I just need a friend to explore the concept with  someone who gets it.

Any advice, support, or perspective would mean a lot. Thanks for reading.

Today felt heavier than usual, and Im not even sure why. It wasnt a bad day, just emotional in a quiet way. I woke up with that strange feeling in my chest, like something was shifting inside me. Not sadness exactlymore like a mix of tiredness, hope, and a little confusion.

I tried keeping myself busy, but my mind kept drifting. Thinking about where I am in life, the people I miss, and the version of myself Im still trying to grow into. Its weird how some days make you feel everything at once.

But there was this small moment that helped: I stepped outside in the evening, and the sky looked soft, almost comforting. It made me feel like even if I dont have all the answers right now, maybe its okay. Maybe Im allowed to take my time, to feel things deeply, to just be human for a minute.

I ended the day a little calmer, still emotionalbut lighter than I started.

The last relationship I was in destroyed me, and when I say destroyed I mean literally; try to imagine breaking a mirror and seeing yourself fragmented.
It's been two months now, she's blocked me from all sides, left me by message and told me that I'm just a useless distraction for her.
I'm not a toxic person either in behavior or intentions, I'm really a piece of bread, a good guy.
I fell in love with her because I saw her as "broken and depressed", having been through it myself previously, I wanted to give her smile back... during the entire time we were together I was the victim of psychological violence over and over again, starting from ghosting and ending up always being to blame for everything, even the end of our relationship... As I was different from her, not having parents and not being exactly right for her.
It's the first time someone treated me like a toy... Used me and then abandoned me.
I have my blemishes too, of course... I started the relationship with her when I was still living at home with my ex, but after a year of separation we remained roommates and on good terms, so much so that we decided to continue living together to save money.
She saw this very badly and continued to throw it in my face for the entire duration of our relationship, to the point of making me live with a sense of guilt that I couldn't swallow.
It is also true that we only had a double bed at home and on a single occasion I slept on the bed, instead of on the sofa very uncomfortable, with my roommate next to me, from 4 in the morning to 7, because then we would leave for a day at the water park... I'll start by saying that I went to sleep at 4 because I spent the night preparing food for the next day.

I feel like no matter how hard I try to be the woman you say you want beside you, its never enough.
We share a home, and I move through it trying to soften your life in the ways I know how.
When you shower, your night clothes are already waiting.
When you game, I bring your food to you, telling you to relax, Ill take care of it, even when I am the one worn thin.
When youre done, I clear your plates, even if the sink waits for me longer than it should because my body is tired from days that never give me rest.

You point out the one thing I didnt do, the one moment I wasnt perfect.
You say you cant live like this every day, as if the days Ive poured into you dont count.
As if laying out your work clothes, leaving granola bars for your rushed mornings, and smoothing the small edges of your world all fade because I missed a patch of dust in the corner.

And still, I dont go out, because you dont like the version of me that surfaces after a few shots of tequila.
You dont like when my laughter gets too loud, or when the tiredness slips off my shoulders long enough for me to feel light again.
The night I went out with my team, you were annoyed that I came back a little tipsy, smiling too brightly, laughing too freely.
In your eyes, even in that moment, I failed you.
All I wanted was a few hours to let my hair down, to feel alive in a way that didnt involve serving or shrinking myself.
But somehow wanting joy made me wrong.

And somehow, your mood becomes my fault.
Somehow, my effort becomes invisible.
Somehow, I become the weight on your chest instead of the hands lifting it.

So I ask myself why am I never enough
Why does loving you feel like a test I am always one breath away from failing
Is it me
Or is it simply easier to blame me than to see how much I am already breaking just trying to keep us together

I feel like a stranger in my own life.

I do not know what is wrong with me. I cannot explain why I feel like this. Why everything feels heavy. Why my chest aches even when nothing is happening. Sometimes I feel like I am drifting through life like a stranger people glance at but never really see. Maybe that hurts more than being invisible. Being seen in all the wrong ways.

I keep wondering if I did something to end up here. Did I push people away. Did they leave on their own. I honestly do not know anymore. My memories change on me. One day I remember laughter. The next day it feels like it never happened. Even my reflection does not feel like it belongs to me. She blinks first. She looks tired. I cannot tell which one of us is lying.

I tell myself I am fine but I do not believe it. The silence inside me is louder than anything. And when the voices show up they make more sense than I do. At least they stay. At least they do not leave without a word.

I try to anchor myself in small harmless things. Puzzles. Painting. Quiet tasks that keep my hands busy so my thoughts do not swallow me. I piece colors together because maybe if I can make something whole, I will remember what it feels like to be whole myself. But even then it feels hollow. Like I am building a life out of scraps hoping one day the picture makes sense.

I do not know who I am anymore. I do not know what I am waiting for. Love feels like a locked door I cannot knock on again. Happiness feels like something I missed my chance at. I feel heartbroken without anyone left to blame. Lost without a map. Haunted by questions I cannot even put into words.

I keep asking myself why I feel like this. Why I cannot be okay. Why I laugh at pain like it is some inside joke. Why I cry alone until the walls sound worried. I still do not have the answers. Maybe I never will.

All I know is that I am still here. Confused and broken. Trying to untangle a story that refuses to add up. Just another stranger passing through wishing I could understand why.

I'm sorry that I'm not enough for you right now. I'm going to get better everyday so that when you're ready, I can be the man you need. I'll always be here for you. That will never change. My heart is ready and when I hear your gentle knocking, I will open the door for you.

I recently landed in Calgary Alberta Canada from Kuala Lumper Malaysia.

Calgary is brutally cold tonight.
I came here to study. Funny how life mocks you: the expert on keeping families together just lost her own fianc two weeks before flying out.
My fianc, Amir ended it over a calm, eight-second voice note. Fourteen months of wedding plans, gone. I was thirty-five, newly single, and boarding a plane to a city Id only ever seen on Google Earth.
The first snow fell today. I stood outside the library letting it settle on my hijab, tears freezing before they could drop. A random Pakistani boy laughed and asked, First winter
First everything, I answered.
Some nights I still wake up reaching for a body that isnt there. Most nights I open my laptop and read about other peoples pain until mine feels smaller.
Tomorrow the sisters from the Northeast masjid are doing a potluck. Someone promised rendang that tastes like home.

I miss Kuala Lumpur.
I miss Amir less every day.
I am cold, I am heartbroken, I am exactly where Im supposed to be.

Bismillah. Chapter two starts now.

2025 November 18: Dear Diary,

There is but one poema I can consider to be the most true and tragic and that is Sylvia Plaths parable of the fig tree. The reality of her poem is apparent, every choice that we make will eliminate all the choices we do not. This tragedy overwhelms me leaving me in a tantalizing despair.  
  
The fact that I can not learn every language I have the desire to learn is disheartening. Seeing all of the people online who I would like to be friends with or love but can not leaves me disappointed. Knowing that I can not help everybody who needs help breaks me. And witnessing all the unnecessary cruelty of human beings leaves me despising the hominid family.

Resentment is not the cure though. Hatred only breeds a corruption of the soul. Though it is tempting to hate, and is perhaps the only logical conclusion to witnessing human beings, misanthropy is unproductive. Instead of hating humans or focusing on all of the actions we would like to take but can not, we should focus on what we love about the world and live with patience.

I am reminded of a dream that I had a few years ago. In this dream a branch of a cherry blossom tree broke off and I wanted to take a petal to keep. My dad told me to wait for him to take off all the petals so I could have a branch full instead of just one. When I woke up from the dream I ripped a page off of the calendar and the next page had a cherry blossom picture with Ecclesiastes 3:22 written under it. So I saw that there is nothing better for a person to enjoy their work, because that is their lot. For who can bring them to see what will happen after them

I saw, and still see, this dream as a prophecy of some kind. Patience will feel like a curse, but will bring all of the petals instead of a few. Maybe I can only pick one fig, but at least I can have a branch full of cherry blossom petals.

Sincerely,

Torinico

2025 November 17: Dear Diary,

It has been better to act naturally. Sometimes I have no idea what I am doing. The trauma of being raised Autistic in the United States leaves an impression on you. It is an impression where you think you are doing things wrong, but you can never be sure what.  
  
I know I am not doing anything wrong. Any attempt to try and make me feel bad about it is just poor gaslighting, which is a favourite activity of neurotypicals not all, just a great amount. Everything I do is done with compassion for other people, even if they do not deserve it.  
  
The only times I have acted out of, what can be considered, cruelty is when I was defending myself. It is my responsibility to break free of societal gaslighting and embrace my true self that wants to spread kindness. It does not matter if people think I am not genuine and try to harass me because of their myopic worldview. What only matters is that I can make a change, even a slight one, on the world.  
  
Sincerely,  
  
Torinico
